company: The How We Feel Project, Inc.
description:
How We Feel is a free app created by scientists, designers, engineers, and therapists to help people better understand their emotions and find strategies to help them navigate their emotions in the moment. Conceived in conjunction with Yale University’s Center for Emotional Intelligence and based on the work of Dr Marc Brackett, How We Feel helps people find the right word to describe how they feel while tracking their sleep, exercise, and health trends in order to spot patterns over time.

Founded as a science-based nonprofit, How We Feel is made possible by donations from people who are passionate about bringing mental wellbeing to the widest possible audience. Our data privacy policy puts you in control of how your data is stored and shared. Data is stored on your device unless you choose to send your data to an alternative storage solution. Data is only accessible by you unless you choose to share it with others. Data is not used for research unless you opt-in to contribute an anonymized version of your data for research studies designed to help more people.

Whether you are downloading this app in order to build better relationships, make your emotions to work for you, not against you, improve how you handle stress and anxiety or simply to feel better, How We Feel will help you identify patterns and find emotional regulation strategies that will work for you. The How We Feel friends feature allows you to share how you feel with the people you trust most in real time, strengthening your most important relationships.
Filled with step-by-step video strategies you can do in as little as one minute on themes like “Change Your Thinking” to help you address negative thought patterns with cognitive strategies; “Move Your Body” to express and release emotions through movement strategies; “Be Mindful” to gain perspective and minimize the negative impact of misunderstood emotions with mindfulness strategies; “Reach Out” to build intimacy and trust, two important tools for emotional wellbeing, with social strategies.

description:
✅  Take Control of Your Health. Track symptoms, medications & mood all from one App.

We are a clinically studied health tracker app that simplifies managing your chronic, mental, and overall health. Easily track your treatments to better understand how your or a loved one’s health is changing over time.

👩‍⚕️Designed with input from patients, parents, & medical experts from top US universities. Discover and monitor trends and easily share it all with your doctor and caregivers.

⭐ 1000’S of 5-STAR REVIEWS
\I love this health app! It lets me gain insights into how I am doing overall with just a few taps a day. I love that I can track all aspects of my treatment in one place.\ -Nat

Why Use the CareClinic App?
- Your health data is encrypted, private and never shared without consent 🔐
- Our AI helps manage your health in just 5 minutes a day
- Unlock insights about your health with just a few check-ins
- Integrates well with wearables, Google Fit & works across devices

CareClinic is more than health symptom tracker app.

We Help You Simplify Your Health Journey - Build healthy habits and remain accountable
- Share data with your doctor, insurance, or employer
- See what works and get a correct diagnosis quicker

📲 Over 15 Trackers included (Toggle only the ones you need!)

🤒 Symptom Tracker
💊 Medication Tracker - For prescriptions, birth control, vitamins & supplements. Indicates interactions & synergies
❤️ Measurements - For vitals, blood pressure, blood sugar, weight, temperature/fever, pulse, or add a custom metric
📝 Health Journal - Freeform or guided with prompts
😀 Mood Tracker - Comes with a medical-grade assessment scale
🥗 Nutrition Tracker - Track micros, macros, calories or just log meals with a built-in database
☕️ Fluids
🚶‍♀️‍➡️ Activities  - Track physical activities like walking, steps and exercises
⚠️ Factors - Environmental factors, social factors, more
🛌 Sleep Tracker - Try sleep sounds
🚽 Stool Tracker - Use the Bristol Stool Scale & Urine
📋 Assessments - Complete standardized medical questionnaires like the PHQ9, GAD7
⭕️ Cycle Tracker - Track your menstrual cycle, period, and ovulation and get predictions
🧘🏻 Therapies
☀️ Weather - Tracks automatically, helpful for those with migraines & mood

📲 And many Modules!

👪 Care Teams: Add your dependents and caregivers, share, nudge & view their data remotely
⏰ Reminders: Easily set reminders for pills, symptom check-ins, activity & more

➕ Store health Goals, Conditions (comorbidities), Allergies, Test Results, Immunizations (vaccines), surgeries
➕ Educational content, soundscapes, quotes, built-in care plans, exercise & medication library
➕ Monitor progress in charts, logs & AI based trends
➕ Trusted by doctors

CUSTOMIZABLE
- Very little manual entry required, use AI + built-in suggestions
- Export PDF reports

👉🏻  Your Complete Health Planner

Essential for chronic illness and mental health, used for ADHD, Anxiety, Bipolar Disorder, Depression, Panic Attacks, PTSD, PMDD, Chronic Pain, Fibromyalgia, IBD, IBS, Diabetes, Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Multiple Sclerosis (MS), Chronic Fatigue (ME/CFS), POTS, Epilepsy, Vertigo, Cancer, Lupus, Psoriasis, IPF, Endometriosis, PCOS, Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome (EDS), MCAS, Dysautonomia, flu, food allergies, gut health, pregnancy symptoms, and other disorders.

Free to use forever or $5.99/m, $39.99/yr for power users. More bearable than using multiple apps. We're here to support as many people as possible with our symptom tracker. If you have concerns, email us.

description:
From WebMD, the one healthcare app you need to check symptoms; learn about conditions and drugs; research treatments and diagnoses; find doctors and specialists in your area; get prescription drug savings at your local pharmacy; and set medication reminders. 

Key Features: 
• Symptom Checker – Choose your symptoms, learn about potential conditions or issues, and lookup treatment and care options.
• Doctor Finder – Find the closest doctors and specialists based on your current location or search by city, state or zip. 
• Medication Reminders – Never miss a dose. You’ll receive reminders when it’s time to take your medications. View daily prescription schedules and instructions, plus pill images with dosage and timing information for each drug.
• Conditions – Find medically-reviewed information about conditions relevant to you and learn more about causes, treatments, and related symptoms. 
• WebMD Rx – We partner with major pharmacy chains to find the lowest prescription drug prices, which often beat insurance co-pays. It’s 100% free to use. No registration required. 
• Customization and Saving Functionality – Save your conditions, drugs, doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and healthy living articles for secure, easy access and reference. 
• Symptom Tracker – Track ongoing symptoms & conditions over time. 
• Drug Interaction Checker – Find and identify potentially harmful and unsafe combinations of prescription medications by entering two or more drugs in question.

About WebMD
WebMD Health Corp. is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the \California Residents\ section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.

The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.
SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.

WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.
WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

description:
MigraineManager is your personal health assistant to help you track & share your headaches more easily and more effectively. 

MigraineManager is designed with leading neurologists and people with headaches. 

It is your personal assistant to better track your headaches, with its complete & user-friendly diary, to better understand your headache, to better manage your headaches, with useful reminders & tips. 
It is also your assistant during your consultations with your neurologist, thanks to a structured, interactive and actionable web dashboard (this dashboard is only available for pro users), to visualize the efficacy of your treatment. 

If you have any questions or issues, feel free to contact us via support@MigraineManager.care ! 

FEATURES 

Between appointments 
• Track your headaches 
Thanks to the diary, you can log your headaches seamlessly. You can also log your side effects, your appointments and any other headache-related event. This will allow the assistant to help you with your headaches. 
• Understand your headaches 
MigraineManager is more than just a diary. It helps you understand your headaches, thanks to personalized summaries 
• Manage your headaches 
MigraineManager aims to help you better manage your headaches, from medication reminders to personalized tips. 

During appointments (pro version only) 
• Visualise your headaches & the treatment efficacy with your neurologist 
The MigraineManager web dashboard allows your neurologist and yourself to have a structured, interactive and actionable view of your headaches. This allows your appointments to be focused on the future instead of the past. 

FAQs 

Is MigraineManager free? 
Yes, MigraineManager is free for all patients. 

Who are you, why do you do this? 
We are a Belgian team, personally impacted by neurological disorders like migraine and epilepsy. Chronic diseases, like headaches, are tough. Unlike temporary diseases, they don’t just need to be treated (because current technologies don’t allow complete healing). They also need to be understood and managed. That's why we're here: we want to help people with headaches, and their neurologists, better track, understand & manage the headaches. 

Is my data safe with you? 
We use the best standards in encrypted communication protocols, so that your data is always safely handled. Want more info? Contact us at support@MigraineManager.care.

OUR COMMITMENT TO QUALITY The Neuroventis Application MigraineManager is part of the Neuroventis Platform, a class I medical software (under EU/MDD regulation) consisting of an Neuroventis Application and Neuroventis Dashboard intended for patients and healthcare professionals to monitor the patients’ chronic neurological disorders. The Neuroventis Application MigraineManager and the Neuroventis Dashboard are specifically intended for patients and healthcare professionals to monitor the patients’ headache. 

Note: this medical device is no substitution for normal care or practice. The data displayed is informative but may be useful to the doctor to support treatment decision. A doctor should always be contacted in case of any symptoms that are not within the expectation.

description:
Welcome to Tappy, where wellness meets fun!

Tappy is a feature-packed self-care fidgeting app designed to help you reduce stress and anxiety in a fun and satisfying way! As you tap or slide, you will enjoy incredible haptic responses and sound effects. And there is also so much more to Tappy! Check out the entire app to discover ways to be mindful, improve mental health, reduce stress, and ease anxiety. You'll find great fidget games and tools (like a Fidget Spinner!) that give satisfying haptic feedback responses, as well as guided meditations, soundscapes, breathing exercises, mood tracking, journaling, and habit tracking! Tappy aims to be your one-stop self-care fidget app for relaxing, focusing, and just having some fun!

Tappy (Health Bar and Actions):
• Tap on Tappy to boost your count!
• Tap the Actions button to show a list of Actions you can do with Tappy such as Sleep, Send Love, Celebrate, and Start the Focus Timer!
• Tappy energy bar at the top of the Tap tab: Throughout the day this health bar with lower, keep Tappy nice and energized by tapping on him to increase his energy!
• Change the haptic feedback type by tapping the customizer.
• In the customizer there are multiple locked features. Press these locks to see how many taps you need to unlock it! 
• Time yourself with the 30 second countdown timer! See how many times you can tap in 30 seconds. Your score will be recorded in Game Center if you are logged in so you can compare your score with people around the world.

Fidget:
• Fidget with a whole bunch of satisfying haptic fidgeting activities and tools!
• Provides sensory stimulation, helping you stay focused and relaxed.
• Turn on sound (and turn off vibrate) to hear the sound effects!

Arcade:
• The Arcade is a place to play some fun quick games with haptic vibrations that will be either multiplayer or single-player.
• New games will be added in the future.
• Grab your friend, warm up your fingers, and get ready to tap! Click the yellow question mark on any game to see the instructions on how to play.

Journal + Mood Tracking:
• Plus members will be able to track their mood and journal about it!
• You can view your mood entries in the \Insights\ section of the Mood Tracker widget.
• Lock your journal entries with your device's Face or Touch ID!

Habit Tracking:
• Create New Habits to track easily, just choose a habit you want to develop, like reading or exercising.

Leaderboards:
• Tap the yellow circle (with the Game Center icon) under Tappy's face to view your current rank that is based off your Tappy Count!
• You can also view your fastest bubble popping times!

Meditations, Feelscapes, and Breathing Exercises:
• Guided meditations!
• Breathe with the haptic breathing guide.
• Relax, focus, and calm down with powerful repeating haptic vibration Feelscape patterns, some are with sounds or music so be sure to plug in some headphones! More Feelscape patterns coming in the future!
• Each vibrating pattern can be set up with a timer!
• Designed to help you focus, relax, and support mindfulness!
• iPhone 8 or newer is required for a full Feelscape haptic audio experience.

Apple Watch App:
• Perfect for moments when you need a quick fidget.

More:
• Haptics: Enjoy the super satisfying haptic activities throughout the Tappy app!
• Theme Color: Go to the Tappy settings, then under the Theme Color section tap the color wheel to select and change the color theme of the Tappy app!

Once you unlock any new feature you'll get an alert.

More features coming soon so get tapping!

Website:
• https://www.pacific.dev

By using Tappy you agree to the Terms and Conditions at https://www.pacific.dev/terms
and have read our Privacy Policy at https://www.pacific.dev/privacy

Disclaimers: 
• Requires iPhone with a Taptic Engine for the full haptic experience.
• Tappy may not be safe for some people with Epilepsy. Some lighting or colors used in Tappy may be disruptive to people who are sensitive to light.

description:
Meet Voda, the mental health companion app lovingly created by LGBTQIA+ therapists, psychologists, and community experts.

Explore personalized support for uniquely queer experiences: from coming out, relationships, body image and self-esteem to navigating gender dysphoria, transitioning, political anxiety, hate speech, and more.

Whether you identify as lesbian, gay, bi, trans, queer, non-binary, intersex, asexual, Two-Spirit, questioning (or anywhere beyond and between), Voda offers inclusive self-care tools and gentle guidance to help you thrive.

____________________________

HOW DOES VODA WORK?

Voda is the daily mental health companion for LGBTQIA+ people.

Through Voda, you'll have access to:
- Daily Self-Care Coach
- AI-Powered Journaling
- Personalised 10-Day Plans
- Bite-Sized Self-Care Journeys
- 15-Minute Wellness Sessions
- LGBTQIA+ Voiced Meditations
- 220+ Therapy Modules & Audios Designed for LGBTQIA+ Lives
- The Trans+ Library: The World's Largest Trans+ Mental Health Resource
- Free Resources on \Coming Out Safely\ and \Coping with Hate Speech\n
______________________

WHAT CAN I LEARN?

Discover evidence-based, compassionate therapy techniques, including:
- Internal Family Systems (IFS)
- Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
- Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT)
- Compassion Focused Therapy (CFT) 
- Polyvagal Theory
- Somatic therapy, Mindfulness and meditation practices

Our content is continuously designed with an intersectional panel of leading accredited psychotherapists and clinical psychologists, and our modules are based on the latest research on LGBT+ therapy, counselling, and queer mental health.

________________

IS VODA SAFE?

Your safety and privacy are our top priorities. We encrypt all cognitive journaling exercises to ensure they remain exclusively available to you. Rest assured, no data is shared with third parties. Your own your own data and can delete it anytime.

_________________________________

WHAT OUR COMMUNITY SAYS

“No other app supports our queer community like Voda.  Check it out!”  - Kayla (she/her)
“Impressive AI that doesn’t feel like AI. Helps me find a way to live a better day.” - Arthur (he/him)
\I'm currently questioning both gender and sexuality. It's so stressful that I'm crying a lot, but this gave me a moment of peace and happiness.\ - Zee (they/them)
\I am a therapist and recommend this app to my clients, it’s really good\ - LGBTQ+ Therapist who uses Voda

________________

CONTACT US

Have questions, require a low-income scholarship or need assistance? Email us at support@voda.co or find us at @joinvoda on social media platforms. We are committed to learning and improving for our community. Please feel free to reach out to us anytime with your thoughts and suggestions.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://www.voda.co/privacy-policy

Disclaimer: Voda is designed for users with mild to moderate mental health difficulties. If you require medical advice or treatment, we recommend seeking care from a medical professional in addition to using our app. Voda is neither a clinic nor a medical device, and does not provide any diagnosis.

description:
The Blood Pressure App is an intuitive and user-friendly blood pressure monitoring app designed to help you take charge of your cardiovascular health. Its easy-to-use interface and powerful features empower you to track, analyze, and manage your blood pressure with ease.

Data Entry After Measurement: 
Record your blood pressure measurements after each reading. You can input systolic, diastolic blood pressure, and pulse. The app also allows you to note pills, arrhythmia, and migraine.

Convenient Statistics: 
The App provides comprehensive and insightful statistics that help you understand your blood pressure trends over time. It generates clear, easy-to-read graphs and charts that display your blood pressure history, allowing you to spot patterns and changes at a glance. You can filter data by date ranges to track progress and share your results with your healthcare provider.

Daily Activity Logging: 
Beyond blood pressure monitoring, the app includes a feature for noting your overall well-being and daily activities. You can track factors like stress levels, physical activity, diet, and more. This information can provide valuable context for your blood pressure readings and help you identify lifestyle factors that may be impacting your health.

User-Friendly Interface: 
The app is designed for simplicity and ease of use, making it suitable for users of all ages.

Our Blood Pressure Monitor is your reliable companion in achieving better blood pressure management and a healthier lifestyle. Take control of your heart health and start your journey toward optimal well-being with this powerful and convenient app.

Good health to you!

description:
Want to get better sleep? Rain Rain Sleep Sounds helps you fall asleep fast! Let hundreds of high-quality, calming sounds lull you into relaxation in no time.

Heavy rain, light rain, thunder sounds - not to mention a huge variety of non-rain tracks, too, like ocean waves, multiple fan speeds, white noise, brown noise, green noise, clothes dryer… even a ticking clock! Create the perfect ambience to relax you after a stressful day at work, or focus in on a difficult to complete assignment.

Includes any sound for sleeping that you can think of, and some you can’t. Millions of people have found the sleep they have been looking for with Rain Rain and you can too.

RAIN RAIN FEATURES

Highest quality sounds available
• Get better sleep by listening to rain, thunderstorms, and nature sounds
• Easily save sounds that have relaxed you with Favorites
• Calm your mind and reduce anxiety with our white noise, brown noise and green noise
• Battle tinnitus with a wide selection of relaxing sounds

Combine sounds to create elaborate mixes
• Mix together the perfect soundscape to improve your mood
• Fuse multiple sounds to improve focus and increase productivity
• Sleep soundly with up to three different sounds playing at the same time
• No limit on playback length

Fade-out Timer and Bedtime Reminder
• Play all night, or use the Fade-out Timer to turn off the sounds after a duration of your choosing
• Set the Bedtime Reminder for gentle encouragement when its time to wind down for bed
• Good bedtime routines have been proven to reduce anxiety and improve sleep quality

Rain Rain includes 50 totally free sounds, and 60+ additional Premium Sounds, available with a subscription to Rain Rain Premium. The Mixer, Favorites, Sleep Timer, Bedtime Reminder, and any other sound without the Premium icon are all available forever without a subscription. You can also preview any premium sound without subscribing. Plus, Rain Rain Premium has a free one-week trial once you subscribe.

Rain Rain has been recommended by New York Times, Buzzfeed and Lifehacker.

Install Rain Rain today and sleep better tonight.

description:
“ALL mums need this app! I can’t’ recommend it enough” ***** The Fountains, Google Play
“Magical calm at your fingertips” ***** Alice Marksy, App Store
Calm, mindfulness, yoga nidra, simple breathing exercises, nutrition and much more for stress, anxiety, overwhelm, exhaustion and sleep.

Being a mum is magical, but also really hard! The Nourish app offers bite-sized calm and wellbeing in your pocket. It will help you find time for YOU. To nourish your mind and body; to soothe your frazzled nerves; to reclaim some calm; to relax, restore & reboot. 

The Nourish app will help you find more balance and joy in your journey as a mum and in turn show up more often as the mum you want to be. 
Self-care isn't selfish, it's the best thing we can do for our kids. ​

Try the app for FREE with our FREE version which offers free access to 150+ quick reads, PLUS 10 audio & video to support your wellbeing. 

Unlock Premium Nourish offering unlimited access to 80+ audio & video, plus 150+ quick reads. Try Premium Nourish for FREE for 1 month when you subscribe, from £1.50/m. Cancel anytime. 

The Nourish app was created by Sara, mum of 2 after her struggles with postnatal depression, postnatal anxiety and navigating work stress on top of all the challenges mum-life holds. 

“Learning how to take moments of calm in my day to soothe my frazzled nerves and nourish my mind, has transformed my journey as a mum and my kids have reaped the rewards. I now have a self-care toolkit I access daily, to help me be kinder to myself and ultimately be a happier and less-stressed parent. ” - Sara, Founder

CREATED BY MUMS FOR MUMS - A SUPPORT TEAM IN YOUR POCKET
Sara has brought together a team of leading wellbeing professionals with a common mission, who share their expertise & tools via the app.

WHAT WILL IT GIVE ME?
Through audios, videos and quick reads, you’ll find ways to reclaim your calm, relax, support sleep and boost the way you feel day-to-day. 

YOUR SELF-CARE TOOLKIT:
Access the tools depending on your needs in different moments:
*NOURISH: by vitality category e.g. Coping skills, Mood boosters
*FEELINGS: by common motherhood feelings e.g. Overwhelm, Guilt, Anxiety etc
*CHALLENGES: by common motherhood challenges e.g. Sleep deprivation
*TEAM: by contributor
*EXPLORE: by format, length or discipline (e.g. Mindfulness, Yoga etc)
*FAVOURITES - Build your personal self-care toolkit
NOTIFICATIONS: uplifting messages, quotes and gentle reminders to be kind to yourself and nourish your mind. Turn this feature OFF in Settings at any time.
FREE TRIAL & SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS:
Nourish Premium offers a 1-month FREE trial when you select a subscription. 
Subscription options: monthly (£2.99/month); annual (£17.99 /12 months). 
When selecting an option, you won’t be charged during the free-trial period.
All subscription options provide FULL access to ALL text, audio & video content, features and future updates.
Payment will be charged to Play Store Account at confirmation of purchase
Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. 
You will be charged based on the cost of the subscription option you choose. 
Subscription automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 
Any unused portion of a free trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
See Play Store’s auto-renewing subscription details for more info.
Manage or cancel your subscription at any time by going to your Play Store account settings after purchase.
Our Terms of Use: https://www.thenourishapp.com/terms-and-conditions

description:
Take the guesswork out of managing your migraine. In addition to finding out what may trigger your migraine attacks, you will discover what factors may protect you and what is likely not to be associated with your migraine.

You’ll gain a deeper understanding of how to self-manage migraine within 90 days by spending just five minutes a day tracking days with and without headache. 

You will get instant access to your data from the first day you track. You can share your Personal Analytical Report with your healthcare provider so that together you can discuss the best treatment options for you.

*NEW - Now available to all users*

Optional Factors - Make your daily tracking customizable by enabling or disabling factors that may affect migraine from a predefined list. You can also add other personal factors, such as suspected triggers, you’d like to track. Build your own customized tracking list.

TOP FEATURES

*Daily Diary*
In just 5 minutes or less a day, track your activities, habits, moods, sleep cycle, and more to easily identify factors that may be associated with your migraine. Early identification can help you make lifestyle changes that may reduce the impact of migraine on your life. 

*Personal Analytical Report*
Get to know your migraine and manage it better as it changes over time. You can do this by getting instant access - at any time - to your Personal Analytical Report, which comes in a PDF format. It’s easy to read and provides information about your migraine activity and pain level progression over time. Share the report with your healthcare provider, so together you can make changes that may help you reduce or avoid migraine attacks.

*Medication tracking*
Set up a list of medications or treatments used for your headache, migraine or other conditions. This will help you to track your treatments easily during your daily tracking.

*My Data*
See graphical and tabular summaries of your data. Here are the tools:

* Summary - Get an overview of the number of days tracked vs. days not tracked. See how many pain-free days you’ve had along with how many migraine and other headache events you’ve experienced.

* Midas - Shows your MIDAS score based on registration questions about the number of days (work, school, leisure, etc.) you’ve missed due to your migraine.

* Monthly - Here you can find out if your disability score is changing month to month.

* Time-Period Comparison – you can compare the frequency and severity of your migraine attacks over different time periods, for example if you started a sleep management program, you can compare the before and after you took it.

PREMIUM FEATURES

#1 Feature No Other App Offers

*Individual Maps*
Discover factors associated with increased or decreased risk of a migraine attack or that are not associated with your attacks at all.
* Trigger Map™
* Protector Map™
* No Association Map
Think you know what your triggers are? Enter them in the Suspected Trigger Map and compare them with the results of the Individual Maps after 90 days.

*LIST OF ALL FEATURES*
Key Features
Individual Maps
○ Trigger Map®
○ Protector Map®
○ No Association Map
○ Suspected Trigger Map
○ Insufficient Data Map
Customizing Factors in your Daily Diary 
○ Optional Factors: Take away the factors you don’t want to track
○ Custom Factors: Add other, personal factors you want to track
Personal Analytical Report
○ Monthly Summary 
○ Headache Calendar 
○ Menstruation Diary (where applicable) 
○ Medication Use Summary 
○ Monthly Migraine-related Disability Score 
○ Trigger Map®
○ Protector Map®
○ No Association Map
○ Suspected Trigger Map
○ Insufficient Data Map
Treatments - medications and other
Headache Calendar - all headache days and migraine days
Daily Diary
Daily Reminder  - set the time you want to be reminded to track
My Data
○ Summary
○ Monthly Disability Score
○ Menstruation Calendar (where applicable)
○ Time Period Comparison

description:
Track Your Heart Health for Free, Anytime, Anywhere with Cardiio. Join over 9.84 million users who trust Cardiio for accurate, easy heart health monitoring. Transform your iPhone into a powerful health tool — track your heart rate, boost fitness, and gain valuable insights, all with just your phone.


Key Features:

1. Instant Heart Rate Monitoring—Accurate and Effortless
• Place your finger on the camera for a precise reading in seconds.
• Featured on CBS’s The Doctors and ABC News.


2. All-in-One Health Tracking Made Simple
• Measure heart rate, blood oxygen, and fitness effortlessly.
• Compare your progress with others in your age, gender, and region for motivation.


3. Quick Workouts to Strengthen Your Heart
• Short, high-intensity 7-minute workouts that boost overall health.


4. Stay in Control—Monitor Progress and Build Healthy Habits
• Unlimited heart rate tracking to stay on top of your health.
• Analyze daily, weekly, and monthly trends—sync seamlessly with Apple Health.
• Export your data easily for personal records or to share with a doctor.


Ready for Deeper Insights? Unlock Cardiio PRO for the next level:

• In-depth pulse waveform analysis
• Blood pressure estimates and detailed oxygen tracking
• Tailored calorie burn estimator for your activities
• Personalized health comparisons by age and sex
• Hypothetical life expectancy based on your heart trends


Why Choose Cardiio?

Cardiio combines simplicity with advanced tracking—perfect for anyone seeking accurate, no-fuss health monitoring. Enjoy a complete set of free features, with the option to unlock more when you’re ready for a deeper dive.


What the Press is Saying:

PC Magazine: \Simple, beautiful, and pretty slick.\nCult of Mac: \Cardiio is one of those apps that wows you...\nLifehacker: \It’s a little mind-blowing...\n

How to Get the Most Out of Cardiio:

Track Daily: Start each day by checking your heart rate to set a baseline.
Follow Your Progress: Use the dashboard to track trends and adjust your goals.
Upgrade for More: Enjoy powerful free features or upgrade when you want even deeper insights.


Download Cardiio now and take charge of your heart health!

Move with Us.

description:
Wondering if you’ll ever sleep again?
Why doesn’t “sleep hygiene” work?
Worried your brain is broken?
Envious of family and friends who never worry about bedtime, and easily fall asleep the second they hit the pillow?

You’re not alone.
In fact, millions of people worldwide are in the same situation…
And they are slowly learning the truth about insomnia.

THE MORE YOU TRY TO SLEEP, THE LESS LIKELY SLEEP IS TO COME.

That’s why we created the BedTyme app, designed to bring the global community of insomnia sufferers closer together.

Developed by a qualified sleep physician, BedTyme gives you uninterrupted access to your own certified sleep coach who’ll keep you accountable and guide you forward as you navigate the road to healing.

You’ll also meet our savvy AI sleep coach, “Ellie”, who’s been trained to make your insomnia healing journey empowering and infinitely insightful. Ellie is your 24/7 compass as you steer away from insomnia and towards a fulfilling life of peace, joy, and SLEEP!

Download BedTyme now to turn roadblocks into stepping stones as you finally learn what it takes to sleep peacefully, for the rest of your life.

Finally, here are links to our privacy policy as well as terms and conditions:

Privacy policy
https://bedtyme.thecreativesbay.com/privacy-policy/

Terms and conditions

description:
Quit Smoking Audiobook app includes 25 chapters reviewing strategies and tactics for approaching the task of finally kicking the habit.

You can listen to the chapters in any order you choose, pause sections, replay and review, or listen to the chapters play back-to-back automatically. Simple steps are presented to help you manage the process of getting to a no smoking lifestyle.


 * Tips to help you stop smoking
 * The advantages of quitting smoking
 * The willpower to quit smoking
 * What happens after you quit smoking
 * Life after smoking


Quit Smoking Audiobook has guidance to help anyone quit smoking gradually. Although this information is not presented by a medical practitioner and is for educational and informational purposes only, you'll benefit from the information this well researched audio book has to offer for meeting the challenge of quitting tobacco.

Throughout the audio chapters an emphasis is placed on how you can convince yourself to make the changes to be successful quitting cigarettes. Multiple approaches to stop smoking are clearly discussed. Failure is honestly confronted within this quit smoking guide.

You’ll want to listen to multiple chapters in the audio book repeatedly to reinforce the positive aspects of every idea that is covered. Tips to help quit smoking are presented together with alternative behaviors you can embrace during the withdrawal period. The dangers of nicotine, second-hand smoke, and the impact on heart health are all covered serving as stark reminders if you aren’t already convinced or aware of the damaging effects of cigarette usage.

Quit Smoking Audiobook has multiple recommendations for you to quit smoking now. Yes you have many other choices with much more expensive quit smoking apps, but after listening to this audiobook, you may be finally ready to say \I quit smoking.\

description:
Meet Betwixt, the cozy story-based game that helps you master your thoughts and emotions, improve your mental health and wellbeing, and aid with unwinding anxiety, depression and rumination. 

Unlike an AI therapist, a mood tracker or a journal app, Betwixt takes you on a guided immersive adventure deep into the mysteries of your own mind. On this epic inner journey, you’ll reconnect with your wisest self and unlock a whole range of psychological powers:

• Improve your emotional intelligence, self care and coping skills
• Calm your nerves and soothe overwhelming feelings
• Uncover new paths to self improvement, self actualization and growth
• Tap into your subconscious mind through the power of story
• Identify your values to increase your motivation, sense of gratitude and life purpose  
• Deepen your self knowledge to help you in overcoming sadness, resentment, low self esteem, fixed mindset, negative perception, insecurities.

💡 WHAT MAKES BETWIXT WORK
Betwixt is a relaxing, de-stressing game that draws on decades of psychology research and therapeutic practice into how we feel, think and behave. It includes tools for emotion regulation and self reflection, journal prompts for mental health, elements of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), mindfulness approaches, Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT), Jungian theory and others. Together, these methods work to improve your wellbeing, calm your mind, increase your self esteem and help you deal with challenging emotions. 

◆ An immersive experience
In Betwixt, you become the hero (or heroine) of an interactive adventure through a dreamlike world that responds to your thoughts and feelings. We’ve used immersive storytelling and sounds to create an alternative for people who find a CBT diary too dry, and struggle to engage with mindfulness, breathing or counseling apps, emotion trackers and mood journals. 

For neurodivergent users, Betwixt stands out among ADHD apps for adults by offering a  creative, engaging approach that removes distractions, improves your focus, motivation and mindset without creating digital addiction.

◆ Evidence-based
Independent psychology research shows that Betwixt can significantly reduce anxiety, stress and depression, with effects that can last months. For years, we’ve been working with various therapists and psychology researchers to make the science of wellbeing accessible to anyone. You can find an overview of our research studies and collaborations on our site at https://www.betwixt.life/

\Captivating. Betwixt is a new direction in mental health.\n- ​Ben Marshall, former adviser to the UK National Health Service

◆ Features
• a cozy fantasy story
• choose-your-own-path game play
• unique psychedelic experience with soothing soundscapes
• 11 dreams that unlock different psychological powers 
• tools for self actualization, improvement, growth, wellbeing and resilience

◆ EVERYONE DESERVES TO LIVE AN EPIC STORY
We believe that mental health resources should be available to all. 
• Access three free chapters
• If you cannot afford to pay, we’ll gift you free access to the entire program
• Support our mission and unlock the full journey for a one-off fee (no subscriptions) from $19.95 (£15.49).

description:
Blood Pressure Tracker is a blood pressure app that helps you track and monitor your blood pressure at your convenience. You can log your BP, pulse, weight, blood glucose, blood oxygen, and more. There is also a spot for notes, so you can add whatever additional information you need, like how you are feeling that day that may have an effect on your blood pressure, like tired, stressed, anxious, etc.

The Blood Pressure App also allows you to track your medications. Search from a list of medications, add notes, and include your dosage. This allows you to keep your list of medications with you whether it is for yourself, a loved one or healthcare professional. You can export this list of medications through a report and send to anyone.

This blood pressure app has an unlimited history and will calculate your average for you as well. Keeping track of your blood pressure over a period of time is the best way to ensure good health. Each log will also display the date and time to ensure you know when exactly you took the measurement. Blood Pressure Tracker also syncs with Apple Health to log your blood pressure and pulse data directly to the Health app!

The app also allows you to view graphs and generate custom reports. The graphs allow you to spot trends and the PDF reports allow you to share your data with anyone. You can send via text, email and more. 

Blood Pressure App is your companion app to help you against hypertension! Using a blood pressure app tracker has been shown to be effective in managing blood pressure.

description:
Concerned about your vaping habit and what it's doing to your health? Looking to cut back but can't live without that feeling? Puff Count is a proven-to-work app that will help you quit vaping. Join over 800,000 users who use Puff Count and start your journey towards a healthier lifestyle now.

Features:
- Track Puffs
- Track Mg Levels
- Visualize your quit progress over time
- Daily, weekly, and monthly status
- Quit with your Friends
- Create Your Custom Quit Plan
- Daily Limits
- Goal Tracking

Track Puffs: Easily track every puff you take.

Usage Monitor: Visualize your progress over time with daily, weekly, and monthly usage graphs.

Daily Puff Limit & Mg Strength: Set daily limits to hold yourself accountable and reduce the amount you vape every day! Set your Mg strength to better understand how much nic you’re consuming.

Recognize Triggers: Tracking your vaping statistics and tendencies will help you recognize, and avoid triggers that make it harder to quit vaping.

Quit Buddies: You don’t have to do this alone! Invite your friends to Puff Count and stay up to date on each other’s progress.

Custom Quit Plan: Choose the date you want to quit vaping for good, and Puff Count will help you get there! By using daily limits that adapt to your habits, Puff Count will guide you through the journey of quitting for good!

What are you waiting for? Take back control of your health with Puff Count!

description:
Whether you’re struggling with your weight, trying to make dietary changes for medical reasons, trying to overcome digestive issues, or are working with a health professional and would like to ditch paper diaries, Nourishly is here to make it a whole lot easier!

Nourishly was built with input from leading dietitians, psychologists and researchers to bring together “what works”, including:

☆  Cognitive-behavioral meal, activity, mood, sleep, hunger and temptation tracking
☆  Simple and specialized meal plans
☆  Science backed micro-missions that tweak your habits to unlock \Ah-ha!\ moments
☆  Rewards that surprise and delight you along the way
☆  Resilience strategies to help unstick you when needed
☆  Link with your healthcare professional for feedback and precision treatment!

Nourishly had been built with love to make you proud and confident in your relationship with food and your body, so that you can fully participate in all that life has to offer.  

Oh, and we take your privacy and security super seriously. We comply with HIPAA and meet industry-standard security practices.

Please note: There is no calorie counting or advertising in this app. 

6 REASONS WHY YOU SHOULD GIVE IT A TRY

1. LINK WITH YOUR CARE TEAM: Turbo charge the care you receive by linking with your Dietitian, Nutritionist, Psychologist, Doctor, Social Worker, Health Coach, Nurse Practitioner, or Personal Trainer for insight-driven care and feedback in AND out of session. 

2. PERSONALIZED MEAL, MOOD, ACTIVITY AND SYMPTOM TRACKER: You are multi-dimensional, and so should be your trusted tracker! Break free from stock-standard calorie counting with customizable and easy symptom, mood, thought, meal and activity tracking. 

3. 400 SCIENCE-BACKED MISSIONS TO MASTER: Gradually master proven habit-hacks that can help you to manage your symptoms, reach your ideal body weight, and feel energetic in your daily life.

4. COPING SKILLS FOR WHEN YOU GET STUCK: Take advantage of 200+ skills to unstick yourself when mental blockers, negative-self talk, lethargy and anxiety strike.

5. MEAL PLANNING TO THE STARS: Pick from expert curated symptom-specific meal plans, create your own, or link with your nutrition expert for a plan personalized for you. 

6. CELEBRATE WINS WITH REWARDS: Be surprised and delighted by beautiful, funny and thought provoking reflection images and affirmations.

description:
Introducing Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor: Your Personal Health Companion like Heartify BPM Monitor

Monitor your heart rate, track your fitness progress, and achieve your health goals with Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor. This powerful and accurate heart rate monitoring application is designed to provide you with real-time insights into your cardiovascular health. With its user-friendly interface, precise measurements, and advanced features, Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor is the ultimate companion for your fitness journey.


Accurate Heart Rate Measurement: Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor allows you to measure your heartbeat, BPM, or pulse zone accurately in less than 10 seconds. Get real-time updates on your heart rate and stay informed about your cardiovascular health.


PPG Graph Visualization: Our app features a PPG graph, similar to ECG/EKG/Cardiograph, which allows you to visualize every heartbeat and BPM. Gain deeper insights into your heart's performance and track changes over time.


Heart Rate Training Zones: Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor helps you optimize your workouts by providing heart rate training zones. Identify your Rest, Fat Burn, Cardio, and Peak zones to tailor your exercise routine and achieve maximum results.


Strap-Free Monitoring: Enjoy the convenience of monitoring your heart rate without the need for any additional straps or devices. Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor utilizes advanced technology to measure your heart rate directly from your smartphone.


Share Heart Rate: Share your heart rate readings with your friends, family, or healthcare professionals. Keep your loved ones informed about your cardiovascular health and seek guidance when needed.


User-Friendly and Beautiful UI Design: We understand the importance of a visually appealing and intuitive interface. Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor boasts a user-friendly and beautiful UI design, making it a pleasure to use. Navigate effortlessly through the app and access all the features with ease.


Smooth Animations: Immerse yourself in a delightful user experience with smooth animations integrated throughout the app. Interact with the app seamlessly and enjoy a visually engaging journey as you monitor your heart rate.


Health Tracking Made Easy: With Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor, you can effortlessly track your heart rate trends, view historical data, and monitor changes in your cardiovascular health. Stay on top of your fitness goals and make informed decisions about your well-being.


Personalized Insights and Recommendations: Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor provides personalized insights and recommendations based on your heart rate data. Receive valuable suggestions to optimize your workouts, improve your overall health, and enhance your well-being.


Data Privacy and Security: We prioritize the security of your data. Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor ensures that your personal information and heart rate readings are kept private and secure.


Download Inpulse Heart Rate Monitor now and take control of your cardiovascular health. Monitor your heart rate accurately, gain valuable insights, and embark on a journey towards a healthier lifestyle.


Disclaimer:

The Heart Rate Monitor: Heartbeat is for reference purposes only. Consult your doctor if required.
Since this heart rate app uses flash, some devices may cause hot LED flashes.
BPM as beats per minute, not Blood Pressure Measurement
Heart rate detection is not intended to be used as a medical device.
This Heart Rate Monitor app is not intended for heart disease or condition diagnosis (afib, heart murmur)

description:
The urge to self-harm is like a wave. It feels the most powerful when you start wanting to do it.

Join over 2 million users and learn to ride the wave with the free Calm Harm app by choosing activities from these categories: Comfort, Distract, Express Yourself, Release, and Random.

There is also a breathing technique to help be mindful and stay in the moment, regulate difficult emotions and reduce tension.

When you ride the wave, the urge to self-harm will fade.

Calm Harm is an award-winning app developed for teenage mental health charity stem4 by Clinical Psychologist Dr. Nihara Krause, in collaboration with young people, using principles from the evidence-based Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT). It is built to NHS standards and approved by ORCHA.

Calm Harm provides some immediate techniques to help break the cycle of self-harm behaviours and explore underlying trigger factors; build a ‘safety net’ of helpful thoughts, behaviours and access to supportive people; and provides the opportunity to journal and self-reflect. It also provides signposts to help.

The Calm Harm app is private, anonymous and safe.

Please note that the Calm Harm app is not a substitute for the assessment and individualised treatment by a health/mental health professional.

Please also note that if you forget both your passcode and security answer, these cannot be reset as we do not create user accounts. You will need to reinstall the app, losing any previous data.

Calm Harm has been given a new look and updated to the latest technology. We’ve listened to users and enhanced the app’s functionality, adding the ability to make journal entries at any time and the option to select multiple reasons for your urge to self-harm after completing an activity. We’ve also updated and expanded the choice of activities based on user suggestions. 

What else is new?
•	Users can add activities to a ‘Favourites’ list.
•	The mascots are now enhanced by animations throughout the app.
•	Choose from a wider selection of colour schemes.
•	Easier access to immediate help via the breathe activity, both during onboarding and in the footer of the app itself.
•	We’ve removed the option to set a passcode to access the whole app and, instead, the self-monitoring section can now be passcode-protected or accessed via facial recognition / Touch ID.
•	Tours explaining key features of the app.

What is staying the same?
•	The app is clinically-developed by a Consultant Clinical Psychologist in collaboration with young people.
•	Optional passcode-protection (though now only for the self-monitoring section).
•	Users choose 5-minute or 15-minute activities (from the same categories as before), counted down by a timer, that are based on the principles of a treatment technique called Dialectical Behaviour Therapy (DBT).
•	Users can still record experiences in the log section (now called My Records) and see information such as weekly average urge strength, most common urges, and most active time of day.
•	The app is completely free, with no in-app purchases required.
•	Users are shown signposts to further help.
•	Our commitment to data privacy and user anonymity.
•	No need for data or WiFi access to use the app.
•	Built to UK National Health Service standards and approved by ORCHA.
•	Users can still personalise their experience.
•	The option to hide trigger activities.

description:
With Ate, tracking your food and health becomes simple and enjoyable. It helps you in appreciating your food choices without judgment and to focus on food's physical, mental, social, and emotional aspects.

Ate encourages positive reinforcement and empowers you to form healthier habits through mindful, intuitive eating. It also tracks exercise, feelings, and water intake for a holistic view of your health journey. Whether your goal is weight management or overall well-being, Ate Food Journal is here to help. 

Embrace mindfulness, cultivate positive self-talk, spot your patterns, and find your groove with Ate.
Download it now for a fulfilling and effective health journey! 

The Ate team 

“Epic food diary app! In just a few days I have more awareness toward what, and why, I’m eating... It’s totally changed my relationship with meals. Thank you so much!” - Angela


CORE FEATURES OF THE ATE FOOD JOURNAL
• Photo-based and visual
• A holistic approach to health - meals & exercise on a single timeline
• Based on mindful and intuitive eating principles - No calorie counting!
• Fully customizable - because we are all unique
• Can be completely private or used with friends for added support


BENEFITS OF ATE BEING A PHOTO-BASED AND VISUAL FOOD JOURNAL:
• Easy and fast to log a meal
• Simple and a joy to review your meals through a beautiful, visual timeline
• Encourages healthier food choices (Add some color [veggies] to that plate!)
• Fun to share with friends for additional motivation and support
• Easy to share it with your coach, if you are working with one

BENEFITS OF A HOLISTIC APPROACH TO HEALTH TRACKING
• Connects food, exercise, and sleep on a single chronological timeline 
• Identify connections between activities and make adjustments (Late workout > late meal > poor sleep? Change it up!)
• Encourages regular eating and improves awareness of hunger cues (Overeating? Understand why that's happening.) 
• Provides a holistic picture of overall wellness when combined with other health indicators

BENEFITS OF FOCUSING ON MINDFUL & INTUITIVE EATING PRINCIPLES
• Improve body awareness and food relationship, and remove food judgment
• Break free from diet mindset, and develop sustainable eating habits
• Embrace food flexibility and guilt-free social events for an enjoyable life

BENEFITS OF A FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE FOOD DIARY
• All our bodies are unique and work in different ways (What works for your friend, might not work for you.)
• Listen to what your body is telling you and find what works for you

BENEFITS OF KEEPING YOUR DAILY JOURNAL PRIVATE OR SOCIAL
• Honestly logging everything is the key to success. So if it helps, keep your journal private. OR
• Share with friends or coach for support and achieve goals together


WHAT ELSE CAN ATE DO FOR YOU?
• Customize Q&A and Reminders
• Fasting tracked automatically
• Track meal times and frequency
• And much more


OUR PRIVACY POLICY
• Ate does not run ads. 
• Ate does not share personal data with others, ever. 
• Ate respects privacy, as a top priority. 


MEMBERSHIP DETAILS
Subscription Details
Ate Food Journal features require a subscription and comes with a 7-day FREE trial. 
Sign up for monthly, quarterly or yearly auto-renewing plans which will start at the end of the FREE trial period. This enables Ate to continuously provide new features and updates. Ate is committed to improving lives everyday. 

Subscription processing is handled by the Google Play Store. Your credit card will be charged through your Google Play Store account when you confirm your purchase. Subscription renews automatically at the same price unless canceled. You can manage subscriptions in Account Settings in the Google Play Store after purchase. Refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the subscription term.

Trying to quit smoking by yourself or are part of a quitting group? Smoke Free’s scientifically tested and proven quit smoking techniques work.

Stop smoking and don’t let your cravings take over. Use Smoke Free to help you succeed this year and every year.

This quit smoking app has helped half a million people to quit smoking and break free of cigarette addiction.

Quit smoking easier with Smoke Free.

Stop smoking by using several quit smoking app features:

Smoking cessation is our specialty. Quit smoking and stop cravings with Smoke Free’s guidance. Smoke Free’s successful quit smoking methods are backed by extensive smoking research.

The quitting process – Quit smoking now with some helpful information:

Quitting smoking is a Smoke Free community effort. Your quit smoking wins can help other smokers quit. The more Smoke Free understands about our users, the bigger effect we have on their success.

Quit Smoking with Smoke Free to Help Us Help Everyone

Try Smoke Free today and start your quitting journey. Quit smoking with Smoke Free and give yourself the help you need to stop smoking for good.

description:
Anxiety and Panic Attack Relief? Mind Ease Has You Covered

🌟Scientifically-backed (from the University of Oxford RCT)
🌟Featured in Vox
🌟Featured in Femestella
🌟Featured in One Mind Psyber Guide

Struggling with anxiety or sudden panic attacks? Mind Easeoffers personalized support to help you manage anxiety and find lasting calm. ✨

Immediate Panic Relief

Feeling a wave of anxiety or the sudden onset of a panic attack? Mind Ease is here to help you find immediate calm. With just one tap of our Panic Relief Button, you'll have instant access to a variety of resources designed to de-escalate your panic attack quickly. 🆘 Take a deep breath and let Mind Ease guide you through calming exercises and techniques specifically tailored to manage panic symptoms and help you regain control.

Mind Ease also offers a variety of other resources for immediate panic relief, including:
• Guided Meditations: Soothe your mind and reduce anxiety with professionally-guided meditations designed specifically for calming panic attacks and promoting relaxation.
• Breathing Exercises: Learn and practice effective breathing techniques to regulate your nervous system and combat anxiety in the moment, helping you manage panic attacks effectively.

We empower you to manage anxiety in the long term and cultivate lasting inner peace through a structured approach to daily self-care. Here's how:

• Empowering Daily Activities: Our app incorporates a variety of activities designed to reduce stress, build coping skills, and strengthen your resilience against anxiety. These activities can be easily woven into your daily routine, becoming a powerful tool for long-term management.
• Journaling: Explore your thoughts and feelings through guided journaling prompts, promoting self-reflection and emotional processing.
• Mindfulness Practices: Learn and practice mindfulness exercises to become more present in the moment, reduce worry, and cultivate inner calm.|
• Stress Management Techniques: Equip yourself with effective stress management tools to navigate challenging situations with greater ease and prevent anxiety from escalating.

Imagine having a supportive companion who understands your unique struggles and tailored guidance on your journey to lasting calm. ✨

Expert-Crafted Techniques to Stop Panic Attacks and Manage Anxiety

Mind Ease was developed by mental health professionals, ensuring you receive evidence-based techniques specifically designed to combat panic attacks and effectively manage anxiety.

Our app incorporates tools like Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), a scientifically proven approach to help you identify and challenge negative thought patterns that contribute to both anxiety and panic attacks. We provide a variety of relaxation exercises, such as progressive muscle relaxation and deep breathing techniques, proven to help regulate your nervous system and promote calmness during panic attacks.

With Mind Ease, you'll benefit from expert-backed techniques that have been shown to effectively stop panic attacks, manage anxiety, and create lasting change.

Download Mind Ease today & find your calm! ✨ 

We'd love to connect with you!
• Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/MindEaseApp
• Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/mind_ease_anxiety_relief

1 ADHD tip/day. Simple as that. No overwhelming distraction.

Reddit user went through 700 Reddit comments and collected ADHD pro-tips. And we created an app because love it. 

u/beatadhd:
\So there was that awesome Reddit thread with a bunch of ADHD'ers sharing real tips that have changed their life.
I thought it was a great change from most advice on the internet which is written by non-ADHD'ers (and it's painfully obvious that it is).

The 131 tips are split into the following categories:

- Memory
- Time Blindness
- Distractions
- Getting Things Done
- Emotional Dysregulation
- Sleep
- Relationships
- Work
- School
- Executive Function
- Nutrition/Medication
\

More coming soon

- Tips for family and kids

description:
The app has sevenbasic modules: depression, anxiety & panic attacks, self-harm, suicidal thoughts, mood monitoring, eating disorder and professional help resources.

The module DEPRESSION contains the WHAT CAN HELP ME feature, including suggestions that could help the user feel better (e.g. exercise, meditation, listening to music, watching videos, drawing, guided relaxation). ACTIVITY PLANNER, which motivates the user to create a to-do list of tasks (check off, edit or delete the accomplished goals anytime) and WHAT MADE ME HAPPY to help the individual focus on the positives of the past day.

The module ANXIETY & PANIC ATTACKS aims on helping the user overcome intense feelings of anxiety and panic attacks. It includes two types of breathing exercises, designed to immediately help the individual to calm down. The first exercise focuses on deep breathing only – switching between inhaling and exhaling. The second exercise is focused on the ‚box breathing‘ technique– full inhale, holding your breath, full exhale and again holding your breath.

Another feature included in this module is COUNTING of simple mathematical equations to help the user focus on something other than the anxious thoughts and physical reactions that accompany each panic attack. The equations are automatically generated and include addition, subtraction and multiplication of numbers 0 to 9, and are immediately corrected. The last feature in this module includes more suggestions on what to do when feeling anxious (e.g. breathing exercise, count from 100 to 0, watch your favourite film etc.)

The module SELF HARM tries to distract from the urges. Once again it provides two breathing exercises. The feature WHAT CAN HELP ME includes suggestions what to do instead of hurting yourself (take an ice-cube or red marker and move it across your skin where you would usually hurt yourself, write down your emotions and describe how you feel and then destroy the piece of paper, scream, exercise or try to diffuse the intense emotions through painting or guided relaxation).

The SUICIDAL THOUGHTS module provides a list of reasons and activities and which could prevent the thoughts or at least show the value of one‘s life. The users create their own EMERGENCY PLANS. The app enables the user to make list of safe activities as an alternative scenario to follow in crisis. The plan includes: who will I contact, what will I say/write, what will I do or where will I go in case of an emergency. It is ideal to create the plan when one is able to think rationally or with the help of another person. This feature also includes a list of people who care about the individual and would potentially be hurt by his actions.

In the REASONS TO STAY ALIVE section, users can create a list of people, things and activities they like or care about enough to stop them from committing suicide. There are a few default entries in the list for users to have an idea what kind of reasons they might put in. And again – the breathing exercises are included in the SUICIDAL THOUGHT module.

In the last module – PROFESSIONAL HELP RESOURCES – there is a list of phone numbers with the option of directly calling the ambulance, hot lines and crisis centres. We also included links to chat rooms in case anyone prefers typing over speaking.

Thank you to Nevypusť duši for supporting our app.

The app is open-source with source codes available here: https://github.com/cesko-digital/nepanikar

description:
An award-winning app scientifically proven to enhance sleep* and engage kids with healthy digital play. Featuring 100s of hours of bedtime stories, educational activities, coloring games, sleep sounds, white noise & more! 

Why Moshi?
-Created by a BAFTA award-winning team, our content is safe, calming and expert-recommended for children, with endorsements from childcare and sleep experts
- We’re 100% ad-free & Kid-Safe, trusted by parents, physicians & experts around the world as a space for children to play, listen, learn or relax day or night 
- Features daily content recommendations tailored to your child's age and interests
- Enjoy special guest narrations by Goldie Hawn and Patrick Stewart

Sleep
- 100s of hours of sleep content tailored for kids aged 0-12, with Bedtime Stories, White Noise, Sleep Sounds, Lullabies & Music
- Recommended by sleep experts & physicians
- Clinically proven to help children fall asleep 28 minutes faster, sleep 22 minutes longer and experience 50% fewer night wakings*
- 97% of parents surveyed agree that Moshi helps their kids fall asleep faster than usual, & 95% said using the app makes bedtime less stressful**

Relax:
- Over 50 guided meditations and breathing exercises teach kids how to manage stress and emotions through proven techniques
- Helps kids regulate their minds and bodies through audio content that teaches breathing exercises and grounding techniques like body scanning, tapping and guided imagery
- 100s of Stories that help children relax, stay engaged, reduce anxiety, and manage negative thoughts
- Tames tantrums and supports emotional regulation through audio-based storytelling which helps kids improve focus & concentration, gain confidence and manage their emotions
 
Play 
- More than 100 interactive, character-led activities help children learn and express creativity in a safe, fun environment
- Coloring: Color in your favourite Moshlings, promoting creativity, self-expression and joy through art
- Puzzles: Put the missing puzzle pieces together to complete the Moshling picture. Improves short-term memory, logical reasoning & spatial awareness
- Memory activities: Remember, find & match pairs of cute Moshlings to help sharpen memory, focus, concentration and critical thinking skills
- Matching: Match colors, objects and emotions to learn identification of patterns, similarities & differences
- Hide & Seek: Search & discover the Moshlings hidden in the picture, developing visual perception & object recognition

Awards
- National Parenting Product Awards Winner
- BAFTA Children’s Award
- Tech for good impact awards
- Loved By Parents Awards: Best Family App

Subscriptions
Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. Your account will be charged 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. If you’ve previously had a free trial, payment will be taken immediately. To manage your subscription & auto-renew settings, go to your Account Settings after purchase.

Cancel anytime in settings at least one day before the end of the subscription period for cancellation to take effect at the end of the current subscription period. Deleting the app won't cancel your subscription.

description:
😓 Struggling to follow through?
Routinery helps you turn intentions into actions.
This habit tracker and routine planner give you structure so starting feels easy and continuing feels natural.


💡 Why people trust Routinery
• 🏆 Featured by Choosing Therapy as best for building habits and routines (2025)
• 📱 App of the Day on App Store (2025)
• 🌍 Google Play recommended in 95 countries
• 🤝 Trusted by over 5 million people across 200+ countries

Struggling with routines is more common than you think. 
This habit tracker helps you start small and stay on track—without the overwhelm.


⚙️ What’s getting in your way?
This routine planner tackles it head-on.

1️⃣“I plan a lot. But I don’t follow through.”
Decision fatigue is real. When your brain is overwhelmed with options, it’s hard to begin.

✔︎Our habit tracker removes the friction
→ Set up your day in steps
→ The timer guides you forward
→ You follow the next task without overthinking

Start small. You don’t need more motivation. You need fewer decisions.
Let the habit tracker lower the pressure and raise your success.


2️⃣ “I’m always busy, but nothing feels done.”
Multitasking creates stress, not progress.
When your attention is split, your energy fades fast.

✔︎This routine planner helps you focus on one task at a time
→ Every task has its own timer
→ You stay present, not scattered
→ Your day flows in a clear, calm sequence

Timeboxing is proven to improve focus, especially for people with ADHD.


3️⃣“I gave up. Again.”
Most routines break because life gets in the way.
One bad morning doesn’t mean you’ve failed.

✔︎This habit tracker lets you bounce back
→ Pause, skip, or reorder tasks anytime
→ Add time or edit without stress
→ You stay flexible and consistent

Resilience builds real habits, and the routine planner keeps you going.


4️⃣“I know I should start. But I don’t feel like it.”
Motivation doesn't lead to action. It follows it.
Behavioral science shows that small actions trigger internal drive.

✔︎This routine planner builds momentum through action
→ Start the timer
→ Press complete for tiny dopamine rewards
→ Watch your progress and keep going

That small click of “done” rewires your brain. It’s how habits grow.
A habit tracker like this makes change feel rewarding.


🌟 Why Routinery stands out
Other apps help you make plans. This habit tracker helps you build habits.
This routine planner is designed to support ADHD and anyone building routines with structure.

• Step-by-step timer flow to beat procrastination
• Auto-next guidance with notifications, vibration, or voice
• Edit anytime without losing your flow
• Start routines instantly with widgets or Wear OS
• 800+ icons for easy, visual routine planner setup
• Templates for ADHD, Pomodoro, hydration, bedtime, and more
• Auto-logging with stats and reflection features

Planning is easy. Repeating is where the real change happens.
That’s why a habit tracker and routine planner that work together make all the difference.


📬 Have questions?
• Reach out to hello@routinery.app — our team answers every message
• Or browse the in-app FAQ for instant help


✨ Try it today
✔︎Popular routines:
• Morning focus: Wake up → Drink water → Stretch
• Night wind-down: Digital detox → Journaling → Bedtime
• Pomodoro: 25-min deep work → 5-min break
• ADHD prep: Airplane mode → Open laptop → Sort tasks

Build real habits.
One small action at a time — with this habit tracker and routine planner.

description:
Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse is an assistant for FITNESS. 
Heart rate is an important indicator of heart health and cardiovascular health. You DON’T need a dedicated heart rate monitor for get your heartbeat and pulse, only download Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse to measure your heart rate and track your pulse.

Features:
▸ Measure heart rate & track heartbeat with just phone, no other device needed!
▸ Record and track your blood pressure.
▸ Pulse waveform graphs are available.
▸ Relaxing music engineered to help your meditation, focus, or sleep.
▸ Privacy is soundly protected, and all personal data is kept locally inside your own phone.

Frequency of use:
It is recommended that you should use Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse daily to measure your heart rate or record your blood pressure. Helps you track the trend of heart rate and blood pressure in real time to better understand your physical status.

Influencing factors:
A normal heart rate depends on the individual, age, body size, heart conditions, emotions, whether the person is sitting or moving, medication use and even air temperature. Most importantly, getting fitter lowers the heart rate, by making heart muscles work more efficiently. 
Measure your heart rate can help you monitor your fitness level, and it may help you spot developing health problems if you are experiencing other symptoms.

Disclaimers:
- Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse is NOT INTENDED FOR MEDICAL USE. It is only used for fitness purposes and is a source of general health information.
- Nothing contained in Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse is intended to be instructional for medical diagnosis or treatment. If you are concerned about your heart condition or need first aid, be sure to consult your doctor.
- Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse cannot detect blood pressure, it only provides the function of recording blood pressure.
- In some devices, Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse makes the flash hot.

description:
Take control of your health with HealthRate: your comprehensive wellness companion!

HealthRate empowers you to monitor and manage your health with ease, helping you stay strong and live a healthier, longer life. Designed for simplicity and precision, this app offers a range of features to track your vital health metrics and keep you informed about your well-being.

EFFORTLESS HEART RATE MONITORING
– Measure your heart rate quickly and accurately using just your iPhone.
– Simply place your finger on the camera to get instant results or sync data from your Apple Watch for seamless tracking.

BLOOD PRESSURE & HEART RATE TRACKING
– Monitor your blood pressure levels and heart rate trends over time.
– Log and review your data to stay informed about your cardiovascular health.

WEIGHT MANAGEMENT TRACKER
– Track your weight changes and add personalized notes to monitor progress.
– Visualize your journey with easy-to-read charts and graphs.

COMPREHENSIVE HEALTH CALENDAR
– View your health metrics in a detailed calendar format.
– Analyze trends with daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly overviews.

SELF-ADMINISTERED HEALTH TESTS
– Perform three key self-administered health tests directly within the app:
– Ruffier Squat Test: Assess your cardiovascular fitness and recovery.
– Pulmonary Function Test: Measure your lung capacity and respiratory health.
– Timed Inspiratory Capacity Test: Evaluate your breathing efficiency and inspiratory muscle strength.

SEAMLESS HEALTH APP INTEGRATION
– Sync all your health data with the Apple Health app for a unified view of your wellness.

DATA EXPORT IN PDF
– Export your health reports in PDF format for easy sharing with healthcare professionals or personal record-keeping.

APPLE WATCH SUPPORT
– Add symptoms and record pulse measurements directly from your Apple Watch.
– Keep your health statistics updated on the go.

AI-POWERED HEALTH ASSISTANT
– Get personalized recommendations and insights based on your health data.
– Stay proactive with tailored tips to improve your well-being.

Disclaimer:
HealthRate is designed to help you monitor your health and fitness, but it is not a diagnostic tool. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical advice or diagnosis.

Track all metrics directly in the MyTherapy health app. Combined with the pain diary and mood tracker, MyTherapy offers valuable insights for doctor discussions, from migraines to ADHD. Use the reminder app for medication tracking and the mood tracker to monitor well-being, helping you follow your health goals easily.

Download our pill reminder now!

💡 Easy to set up: Simply type your medication or search our drug database to create your personal medicine reminder. Set different times for weekends—perfect for anyone needing a reliable reminder app.

⏰ Medication reminder: A dependable pill reminder and med timer for taking medications, tablets, and supplements on time. The medication tracker records every intake reliably.

🛒 Pill counter and refill alert: Our health app's pill counter monitors your stock and sends a prescription reminder when it’s time to refill.

📝 Pain diary and mood tracker: Document pain symptoms and emotional states. The mood tracker helps monitor mental health alongside your physical health.

📊 Monthly health reports: Track tablet intake, blood pressure, and symptoms automatically. Export your health diary as a PDF for medical appointments. Manage everything with one smart health app and reminder app.

💉 Injection site reminder: The med timer supports injection therapies, helping change injection sites regularly (useful for diabetes, MS, or obesity treatments).

👨‍⚕️ Appointment reminders: Manage doctor’s visits easily. The medicine reminder app keeps you on schedule for appointments, prescriptions, and checkups—essential for anyone wanting to follow their health routines.

🏆  First place in the German Health Award from news channel N-TV and the German Institute for Service Quality (09/2023) for our med timer. 

If you seek a multifunctional pill counter offering reliable medicine reminders, medication tracking, and stock monitoring, plus a mood tracker and med timer, MyTherapy is the health app you need.

Download the MyTherapy pill tracker today to experience a top-rated reminder app, health app, pill counter, and med timer—supporting you to follow your health goals every day.

description:
Monitor and manage your pulse rate, rhythm, blood pressure, oxygen levels with your smartphone, catch and analyse them the in-time. 

Features:

1. Manage and track blood pressure and pulse rate, input and manage data measured on your blood pressure meter.

2. Manage and track blood oxygen levels, input and manage data measured on your blood oxygen meter.

3. Real-time pulse monitoring and tracking


* Quick and easy: It takes just 30 / 60 seconds to check your heart rhythm. Place your finger on the camera of your smartphone, and put your mind at ease.

* Measure whenever you want: Are you experiencing symptoms, such as palpitations? Open the app and take a measurement immediately.

* Regular measurements: With Checking Rhythm, you can measure your heart rhythm twice daily. This way any changes in your heart rhythm will be detected more quickly.

* Notifications: Set up notifications for your measurements.

* Integrated with Apple Health App

* PPG is a technique with ECG quality that uses light to detect pulse rate. It measures changes in the size of your blood vessels by using the flash of your smartphone camera. These are then converted into heart rhythm measurements.


***** MEDICAL DISCLAIMER ******

This application is not intended for medical use. Statistics and measurements are only used for educational and informational purposes in order to support general health and wellbeing. This app is not a clinical pulse oximeter. You can visit a specialist hospital for a more thorough health examination if you think there is something wrong with your health.
