Kardia works with the FDA-cleared KardiaMobile, KardiaMobile 6L, or KardiaBand personal EKG devices, which can detect the most common arrhythmias in just 30 seconds. The Kardia app is designed to make managing heart care from home easier than ever, giving you the ability to seamlessly record EKGs, share heart data with your doctor remotely, keep track of your health history, and more.

Capture a medical-grade EKG with your Kardia device anytime, anywhere—no patches, wires, or gels required. Get an immediate result from Kardia's Instant Analysis of normal, possible atrial fibrillation, bradycardia, or tachycardia. For additional analysis, you can choose to send the recording to your physician or to one of our partners for a Clinician Review by a cardiologist (US, Australia only) or cardiac care physiologist (UK, Ireland only).

The Kardia system is recommended by leading cardiologists and used by people around the world for accurate EKG recordings. Track your heart health data from home with the medical accuracy your doctor can trust.


NOTE:  This app requires KardiaMobile, KardiaMobile 6L, or KardiaBand hardware to record an EKG. Get your Kardia device now at alivecor.com.

description:
Advanced Binaural Brainwave Entrainment combined with Ambient Music, Nature Sounds, Other Audio Apps or your own iTunes Music. * Includes Multi-Stage Binaural Programs for Sleep, Focus, Memory, Energy, Positive Mood, Power Nap, Deep Sleep, Motivation, Confidence, Anxiety & Stress Relief, Relaxation, Meditation & much more! * Recommended by Stanford Neuroscientist Dr. Andrew Huberman on the Huberman Lab podcast. * Includes 'Pure Tones' to select from 20 specific binaural frequencies. * Can run alongside other apps like Spotify or Audio Book Readers * Use Included Playlist Creator to create an iTunes Playlist for each program * Headphones/Earbuds must be worn for Binaural Tones to be effective * Universal iOS app with UIs included for iPhone and iPad, so you can use it on all your devices! * Supports Family Share * No in-app purchases or subscriptions! 

Different states of mind are associated with specific brainwave frequencies that would be inaudible if played directly. These frequencies can be induced in the brain by playing two different tones into each ear (binaural tones), which after being processed by the brain, are perceived as an inaudible beat matching the target brainwave frequency. As you listen, your own brainwaves fall into step and synchronize with this frequency. 

BrainWave uses low, mid, and high frequency ranges of Delta, Theta, Alpha, Beta, and Gamma binaural tones combined in layers and stages to create powerful multi-stage experiences.

- Morning Coffee
- Espresso Shot
- Morning Meditation
- Focused and Alert
- Gamma-40 Focus
- Critical Thinking
- Concentration
- Memory Boost
- Problem Solving
- Brainstorm
- Confidence Boost
- Pre-Exercise Energy
- Creativity Boost
- Positive Mood Boost
- Motivation Boost
- Euphoria
- Stress Reduction
- Anger Relief
- Calm Reflection
- Reduce Anxiety
- Deep Relaxation
- Meditation
- Lucid Dreaming
- Power Nap
- Gamma Power Nap
- Dreamy Sleep
- Deep Sleep

- Deep Sleep with Wake-up Stage
- Dreamy Sleep with Wake-up Stage
- Headache Relief
- Hangover Relief
- Yoga Meditation
- Alpha Relaxation
- Theta Meditation
- Night Meditation
- Night Reading

Pure Tones - Select from the following binaural frequencies:

1 Hz - Deep Delta
2 Hz - Low Delta
3 Hz - High Delta
4 Hz - Low Theta
5 Hz - Mid Theta
6 Hz - High Theta
7 Hz - Low Alpha
8 Hz - Low-Mid Alpha
10 Hz - Mid Alpha
12 Hz - High Alpha
14 Hz - Low Beta
18 Hz - Low-Mid Beta
20 Hz - Mid Beta
25 Hz - High-Mid Beta
30 Hz - High Beta
35 Hz - Low Gamma
40 Hz - Gamma
60 Hz - Mid Gamma
80 Hz - High-Mid Gamma
100 Hz - High Gamma 


* Backgrounds *

- Beach Surf
- Ocean Waves 
- Ocean Waves 2
- Rain & Thunder
- Atmospheres: Serenity
- Atmospheres: Awakening
- Atmospheres: Space
- Atmospheres: Drifting
- Atmospheres: Peace
- Atmospheres: Floating
- Atmospheres: Soaring
- Medium Rain
- Light Rain 
- Waterfall 
- Flowing Creek 
- Pink Noise
- Forest
- Flow
- Solar Waves

* BrainWave's binaural tones are helpful for Tinnitus as it provides an audio mask for tonal Tinnitus while also reducing the neural hyperactivity that underlies Tinnitus. 

* Do not use Binaural tones while driving or operating machinery

description:
** Named best CBT app ** by Marie Claire 
** Featured in well + good ** 
** Featured in The Guardian **

WorryTree is a self-help tool that helps you identify your worries, challenge them, and reform your thoughts. The process is powered by CBT or Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, also known as the Worry Tree technique.
 
Using our app, you can learn about your negative thoughts, discover different ways to manage anxiety, stress or panic and feel better.

This is the clearest, easiest-to-use CBT therapy app available today, where you can practice the Worry Tree technique.
 
⭐ What Can You Do With WorryTree App ⭐
 
✔️ Manage stress and anxiety using the CBT technique 
✔️ Practice CBT anywhere alongside your therapy 
✔️ Record and download your worries and show them to the therapist 
✔️ Set reminders of your action plans to manage worries 
✔️ Find ways to extract yourself from negative thoughts 
✔️ Create a personalised action plan for each worry
 
⭐ WorryTree: Anxiety CBT Therapy Features ⭐

✔️ Get started for Free 
✔️ Mobile-friendly, convenient user-interface 
✔️ Self-help stress management tools powered by evidence-based strategies ✔️ Access blogs, tutorials and webinars 
✔️ Options to change the theme: System, Light, Dark 
✔️ Calendar, Daily Notification, and other reminders 
✔️ Progress tracker 
✔️ Also available in Spanish
 
⭐ Deal with your worries

Find out what thoughts make you anxious with this app. WorryTree presents an effective way of challenging your negative thoughts by creating action plans. Categorise your worries, create custom action plans to manage them and learn to change your thoughts.
 
⭐ Bring positive changes

Consistent practice of CBT brings positive change in your mental health. WorryTree is the perfect tool for practising CBT therapy daily. We have options to send several reminders to keep you on track. Turn on reminders to follow your action plan and feel better than ever.
 
⭐ Practice gratitude

WorryTree helps you identify the good in your life and show your gratitude. Set reminders to practice gratitude and unlock the “feel good” vibes.
 
⭐ Built by worriers for worriers

WorryTree was founded by Louise, who was diagnosed with Generalised Anxiety Disorder a few years ago. She had to undergo a series of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy sessions to manage her issues. Her sessions encouraged her to share the power of CBT with the world and make it easy to access from anywhere. No wonder WorryTree is a revolution that was built by worriers for worriers. 

Along with generalised anxiety disorder, people suffering from panic attacks, social anxiety, and stress might also benefit from CBT. WorryTree works like a guided journal to track your thoughts and emotions, manage your worries, offer anxiety help, encourage self-reflection and stress relief/anxiety relief and improve your mental health. 

❤️ To practice CBT and feel better, install WorryTree now. 

You can read our Terms and Conditions in full at 
https://worry-tree.com/terms-conditions. 

Please note: 

WorryTree is not a substitute for professional mental health care, therapy or advice. If you're concerned about any aspect of your mental health or someone else's, you should always approach a professional, such as a qualified therapist or your GP.

description:
Nadiya - A Quest For A Safer Place - is a free app that gives families affected by trauma the power to thrive in difficult times.

It's a sanctuary where parents and carers of children can find well-designed, fun, and easy-to-use resources to help make life’s biggest challenges feel a little less scary. 
 
In just 14 days, you and your child can learn to find calm in the middle of a storm, be kinder to yourselves and others, have difficult conversations and find hope when everything feels hopeless.

Nadiya gives you and your child the skills you need to guide you through these darker moments.

In the game, you and your child will be transported into a magical woodland realm, where you’ll help the guardian of the forest defeat the Troublesome Spirit. Together, you’ll help Nadiya - a frightened little girl who transformed herself into a tree - to heal, and you’ll restore the rest of the forest so it’s safe again. 

To advance through the world, you and your child will complete daily check-ins about how each of you is feeling and collect special charms, which are earned through simple therapeutic games and exercises - designed by experts in child psychology and trauma - that will help you both to build your inner strength, cultivating important qualities such as compassion, courage, and calm. Upon completing these tasks, you’ll then create a special healing potion that’ll transform the clearing of the forest into a magical garden that you’ll take care of together. As you do this, you’ll strengthen your relationships as a family, learn how to be kinder to yourselves and others, become more confident in your ability to navigate difficult times, and rediscover hope.

The app has been created by Apart of Me, an award-winning charity dedicated to supporting children through loss and trauma by integrating world renowned clinical expertise with innovative design. We specialise in designing products that help children and families through the most difficult challenges in life. Nadiya was developed in collaboration with  Compass Pathways, Voices of Children, and the International Association Of Psychologists For Grief And Severe Loss. Apart of Me is a Charitable Incorporated Organisation, registered with the Charity Commission (England and Wales), Charity Number 1194613.

description:
Welcome to Sleep With Me, your go-to sleep aid app designed to transform your bedtime routine into a soothing and rejuvenating experience. Take a moment to breathe deeply and embark on a journey towards improved sleep, relaxation, and overall well-being.

Our app is crafted with care to offer a variety of step-by-step breathing practices tailored to your unique life and circumstances. In just a few minutes, you can discover the profound benefits of intentional breathing—enhancing sleep, reducing stress, and promoting a healthier lifestyle.

Create a daily routine that aligns with your needs, guided by easy-to-follow breathing sessions suitable for any situation. By incorporating sleeping exercises into your regimen, you'll find relief from stress and insomnia, paving the way for a more tranquil and restful night's sleep.

Unlock the potential to relax, enjoy better sleep, and fortify your relationships with our specially curated breathing courses. Experience the transformative power of a few minutes dedicated to intentional breathing, enabling you to fall asleep faster and enjoy a deeper, more rejuvenating sleep.

Dive into the realm of Sleep Sounds—bedtime melodies meticulously crafted to guarantee a deep and restful slumber. With over 50 exclusive sleep melodies for both adults and children, our app provides a diverse selection to cater to individual preferences. Drift off to dreamland and wake up feeling refreshed and revitalized.

The Clear Mind feature is a practice designed to calm your mind and body before bedtime. Regain control, soothe your nervous system, and create a serene mental space to enhance the quality of your sleep. Embrace the tranquility that comes with a clear and focused mind as you prepare for a night of deep and restorative rest.

Our Fall Asleep feature is carefully designed to help you relax your body and release the stresses of the day. Drift away gently into a restful sleep, letting go of tension and welcoming the peace that accompanies a rejuvenating night's rest.

Experience the many benefits of better sleep—a more relaxed demeanor, improved cognitive abilities, enhanced charm, and overall well-being. Uncover the path to a healthier and more vibrant life with Sleep With Me. Embrace the power of intentional breathing, soothing sounds, and personalized sleep experiences tailored just for you.

Get Sleep With Me today and embark on a journey towards a more peaceful and rejuvenating night's sleep. Transform your bedtime routine into a sanctuary of relaxation and well-being, and wake up ready to face the day with renewed energy and vitality.

description:
Take Control of Your Smoking Habits – Track, Reduce, and Quit

Struggling to quit? Need help managing your smoking habits? Whether you want to gradually cut down or quit altogether, this smoke tracker is designed to support your journey. Log each cigarette with a simple tap and gain valuable statistics on your daily smoking patterns. With structured programs and insightful data, you’ll have the tools to break free from addiction and build a healthier future.

🚭 Your Personalized Quit Plan

Quitting smoking is tough, but the right strategy makes all the difference. Our app offers three scientifically backed programs to help you reduce your smoking in a controlled way:

✔ Linear Descending – Reduce your cigarette intake gradually over time.
✔ Fixed Interval – Stick to scheduled smoking breaks to limit your consumption.
✔ Minimum Interval – Increase the time between each cigarette, reducing cravings step by step.

With real-time tracking and tailored recommendations, this quit smoking app free provides the support you need to reach your goals.

📊 Insightful Statistics & Motivation

Understanding your habits is key to making lasting changes. The app’s statistics feature provides detailed graphs and reports to track your smoking reduction progress. Each time you light up, the no smoking tracker records it, helping you stay mindful of your habits.

If you’re also trying to quit vaping, the app works as a vape quitting assistant. Track every e-cigarette session, analyse patterns, and gradually cut down on nicotine intake. This vaping tracker is designed for both cigarette and e-cigarette users who want to reduce dependency.

⏳ Precision Timing & Smart Tracking

Built-in timers help you stay disciplined. Whether you're following a quitting smoking app program or managing cravings, the quit nicotine tracker lets you monitor your intervals, showing how long you've gone without smoking. Over time, you'll notice your ability to delay each cigarette improving a key step towards success.

🏆 Psychology-Based Support for Quitting

Breaking free from smoking requires more than just willpower it requires support and structured guidance. This quit smoking tracker helps reinforce positive habits through a psychology-based approach, making it easier to overcome cravings. Say goodbye to smoking with a clear plan, motivation and real-time progress tracking.

📥 Start Your Smoke-Free Journey Today!

Download this stop smoking tracker now and take control of your smoking habits. Whether you're quitting cigarettes, avoiding vaping, or looking for a quitting smoking app, this powerful tool will help you succeed. Start today, track your progress, and achieve your smoke-free goal!

description:
Personalized support to cut back or quit drinking. 100% anonymous.

Drinker’s Helper is an app built by people who quit drinking to help others stop drinking alcohol or moderate their drinking. We provide an alcohol tracker, a support group, and motivational exercises to help members achieve their sobriety or moderation goals. 

For free, anyone can:

* Take our alcohol test to assess your drinking
* Decide to stop drinking alcohol or set a moderate drinking goal
* Use our alcohol tracker to track your drinking vs. your limits OR use it as a sobriety counter or sobriety clock to track your sober streak
* Make and track a pledge to stay sober 
* Try the first exercise of each course in our library (up to 17 exercises in total) to help you resist urges to drink and build motivation to change

With DH Plus, our paid subscription, members can:

* Join a personalized support group, where you can get encouragement from other people with similar drinking histories (it’s 100% anonymous, so you can share freely)
* Access the rest of our library of over 100 motivational exercises 
* Go beyond the drink tracker to get deeper insight on the strategies that help you stick with your limits and the triggers that make you want to drink
* Access insights from the community on strategies that work for them and benefits they’ve seen from sobriety or moderation

We know it isn’t easy to quit drinking (or cut back). Whether you’re just doing a Sober October or a Dry January, or if you’re done drinking, we hope that by joining our community, you can:

* Discover you’re not alone in wanting to drink less or stop drinking
* Become more mindful in your drinking decisions using the drink counter
* Strengthen your personal motivation to quit drinking or drink less
* Get and give meaningful support to others looking to change
* Reflect on why you drink using the drink tracker, so you can find healthier substitutes 
* Learn about the effects of alcohol and the benefits of changing
* Learn skills to resist urges to drink

DH Plus subscription pricing and terms:

Though Drinker’s Helper is free to download and use, we offer a premium subscription (DH Plus) that unlocks additional features. You can try out DH Plus free for 1 WEEK, and if you enjoy your trial, your subscription will automatically continue for as long as you choose to remain a member.

The pricing and rates for auto-renewing subscriptions are as follows:

1 month for $14.99 (USD)
3 months for $38.99 (USD)
6 months for $59.99 (USD)

Your payment will be charged on the last day of the current billing period. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current 1, 3, or 6 month periods, for the same amount and package duration as the package you choose: $59.99 every 6 months, or $38.99 every 3 months, or $14.99 every 1 month.

Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Your membership starts as soon as you set up payment with iTunes. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

Privacy policy: https://www.drinkershelper.com/privacy-policy
Terms & conditions: https://www.drinkershelper.com/terms-and-conditions

Cautionary notes: 
* This app cannot offer medical advice or provide alcohol addiction treatment, and is in no way a substitute for medical treatment. If you have a medical emergency, please call 911, and if you have medical questions or concerns, please see a doctor.
* Alcohol withdrawal can be fatal. If you have been drinking heavily or consistently, consult a doctor before making significant changes to your drinking. If you experience alcohol withdrawal symptoms when going sober or drinking less, consult a doctor.

description:
Our non-smoking app reliably accompanies you on the difficult path so that you can soon get by without cigarettes.
Do you want to quit smoking for good in order not to endanger your health with cigarettes? Because cigarettes are by no means worth it.
In our non-smoking app, we will quickly show you all the advantages that you can gain back through a smoke-free life. This includes not only the money saved, which cannot be insignificant, but of course first and foremost your irreplaceable health and a better quality of life!

Get your independence back now and don't be the person who fails because of such a small thing - we will accompany you and help you with this big step with our non-smoking app!

Did you know that in addition to the addictive substance nicotine, there are around 4800 chemical substances in cigarette smoke, more than 70 of which are carcinogenic or suspected to be? This is a total disaster for human health and quality of life!
These include: tar, chromium, benzene, arsenic, lead and radioactive pollonium. Further examples of toxic and thus highly toxic substances are: carbon monoxide, hydrogen cyanide, nitrogen oxides and the Seveso poison dioxin and you inhale all of this into your body with every cigarette and pass these health pollutants on to everyone who passively inhales your exhaled smoke. Change that now!

With our non-smoking app, we give you tried-and-tested assistance that will finally enable you to live as a non-smoker.
Nowadays you don't necessarily have to do without nicotine to get rid of the vice of cigarettes. There are many good and proven alternatives such as B. Nicotine patches, nicotine sprays and e-cigarettes with and without nicotine.
Even if it may sound incredible to you at first, these alternatives can help you on your way to becoming a non-smoker and thus reduce the withdrawal stress from nicotine for your body.


Functions of our non-smoking app
- We accompany you in your plan to become a non-smoker
- Display of the gained lifetime
- Diary in which you can write down your mood
- Motivation notifications - We'll keep you on track!


What are you waiting for? Start your healthier life today without cigarettes and smoke - download our free non-smoking app now and - let's go!

description:
Hypnomatic is a mobile app for hypnosis sessions that helps you to get rid of many problems effortlessly.

\Believe me, it's really amazing\nwww.best10app.com

\At last, an interesting app in AppStore!\ 
www.apppicker.com 

Hypnosis is a means of developing personality and dealing with psychological problems. In the early 2000s, at the intersection of digital technologies and psychology, a new technique ”computerized hypnotic sessions” emerged. Unlike the classical approach, the hypnosis sessions have a wider arsenal of methods of altering consciousness.   

A hypnosis session is a program which contains visual imagery (spirals or circles of a certain color rotating and pulsating at a given frequency) and a soundtrack which influences the subconscious according to the theme of the session selected. Due to simultaneous use of subliminal suggestions and neurowave stimulation, a session helps a person to overcome psychological, physical and emotional barriers. 

In addition to individual peculiarities of the conscious, all people have common mechanisms of psychic activity (inborn reflexes, basic instincts, frequency response); this is exactly what hypnotic sessions deal with. Now it is possible in a few weeks to achieve the effect that took the analysts months and years before. You don’t have to go to a qualified hypnotherapist as you can achieve the effect in a comfortable environment, without leaving your house. 

The following hypnosis sessions are available for the “Hypnomatic” users: 
* Weight Control 
* Quit Smoking 
* Money Orientation 
* Health
* Desires 
* Focusing on Studies 
* Lucid Dreaming
* Self Confidence
* Analytical Ability
* Sexual Confidence
* Sports 
* Freedom 
* Tussle with Insomnia 
* Big City 
* My Reality 
* Fear of Flying
* Knowledge 
* Biorhythm 
* Happiness 
* Overcoming Fears 
* Jealousy Reduction 
* Relaxation 
* Nail Biting Habit 
* Stopping the Internal Dialogue 
* A Big Day 
* The Fear of Making Acquaintances 
* Yoga 
* Wit 
* Creativity
* Alertness while driving
* Painful breakup
* Hangover aid
* Learning languages
* Energy recovery

Each hypnosis session includes an instruction. Misuse or use of sessions more frequently may lead to negative consequences. It is possible to use several programs at the same time. Moreover, it is not recommended to use hypnosis sessions while under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or if a person suffers from paranoia, schizophrenia, psychosis psychotic disorder, epilepsy or arrhythmia. 

You have to understand that the issue is not a mystical healing as if touched with a magic wand, but a specific and purposeful work on the side of a client. A hypnotherapist or a hypnosis session facilitates an input into this powerful state of the brain, but the result depends primarily on a client’s desire and will.

appName: Pulse HRV by Camera BLE ECG
description:
Check: Heart Rate (Pulse), Heart Rate Variability (HRV), Fitness, Stress level, Cardio calculations track progress and more using smartphone camera, ECG or BLE (additional device required).

App detects heartbeats using: 
1. Integrated camera (PPG-Photoplethysmography signal processing) 
2. BLE enabled fitness additional device
3. Mobile ECG sensing extender additional device which is available for preorders

PPG-Photoplethysmography signal is captured using smartphone camera by placing finger on the camera lens. PPG signal is result of volumetric changes in blood in peripheral circulation.

Application provides summarized analysis results (as classes starting from Poor .. to Athlete) using HR and HRV (Heart Rate Variability) analysis.

Some analysis interpretation instructions:

Normal resting heart rate for adults ranges from 40 to 70 beats a minute. Lower heart rate at rest implies more efficient heart function and better overall fitness.

Heart Rate Variability
HRV correlates with heart health, stress, athletic training, emotional health, and fitness. 
rMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences) is strong overall Fitness level indicator. Try to have rMSSD greater than 40ms, track your progress in app history graph.
HRV graphs show changes in pulse. 

Cardio
Get benefits from Cardio using zones calculation and instructions in the app.

Analysis duration
In general, longer analysis provides more reliable results.
 * 10-15 seconds is sufficient for Heart Rate
 * 30 seconds analysis provides HRV measurements
 * One minute analysis provides more reliable HRV measurements
 * Two+ minutes analysis is necessary for reliable spectral analysis

ECG for Everybody https://ecg4everybody.com is in early stage and we are open for cooperation. Our Mobile ECG sensing extender device is ready for pre-orders. It is an unique mobile ECG sensing solution which can operate without electrodes and capture up to six ECG channels with dozen lower manufacturing price design.

This is not a medical app.

description:
SAM supports people with autism in dealing with daily experienced stress.

Stress Autism Mate (SAM) App is a scientifically based, personalized application created for and by people with autism spectrum disorder. The app was developed by GGz Centraal in co-creation with clients with autism and in collaboration with the research organization TNO.

With SAM you can:
•	Fill out a questionnaire 2 to 4 times a day
•	Based on these questionnaires, determine your current stress level
(SAM uses a scientifically validated algorithm for this)
•	Get an overview of the moments and your daily activities that go well and those that go less well
•	Get tips to reduce your stress at any time of the day
•	Enter your own tips or try those of others

But also:
•	Use the diary to write down your thoughts and feelings
•	Customize the settings so that the application suits you well
•	Discuss your weekly overview with a friend, loved one or practitioner (but only if you want to, you are in control)

SAM, against the stress of today and tomorrow.

Contact
Do you have feedback or questions? Let us know! We want to keep improving SAM. E-mail: sam@ggzcentraal.nl

description:
HOW NOOM WORKS

Psychology: Our curriculum uses evidence-based approaches and scientifically-proven principles such as cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) to help people with mindfulness, weight loss, and building healthy sustainable habits that last a lifetime.

Technology: We’re constantly innovating and fine-tuning our platform to ensure our users—we like to call them Noomers—have access to the most effective healthcare, nutrition, and coaching tools in the market that match their lifestyles.

Human Coaching: Noomers can opt to be matched with one of our thousands of trained fitness and nutrition coaches, who help guide them along their weight loss and mindfulness journeys while providing the support needed to achieve their goals.

NOOM WEIGHT
Discover weight loss techniques that work for you and keep the weight off for the long run. We’ll help you better understand your relationship with food, nutrition and calories, how to be more mindful of your lifestyle habits, and give you the knowledge and support for healthy, long-lasting lifestyle changes.

FEATURES
- Personalized tips, weekly insights from coaches, feedback on your food choices and more—all designed to help you reach your health, fitness and weight loss goals.
- 10-minute daily lessons that help you develop healthy habits.
- - Enhanced AI food logging featuring a diverse food database with over 1 million scannable barcodes.
- Health-tracking tools like weight logging, water and calorie tracking, and step counting.
- Noom Move, featuring over 1,000 on-demand fitness, meditation, and stretching classes.
- Hundreds of healthy, simple low-calorie recipes that don’t require you to restrict your diet.

NOOM MOOD
Manage daily stress, anxious thoughts, and practice mindfulness. We’ll guide you, step by step, to mental wellness—and help you gain the emotional awareness
to live your happiest life.

Ready to join millions of other Noomers and take control of your health? Sign up for Noom today, and find the motivation to change your lifestyle—and make it last.

description:
How are you?
The most common question to ask others, but how often do you ask yourself?

Pi is for you who wants to keep track of how your mood is affected by all those paths that you both consciously and unconsciously take in life.

Because we all have experienced the days of being down, felt the stress that could turn our brain into syrup or the anxiety, that runs like an electrical charge throughout our body. But what makes us to feel this way?

Pi believes that life is a journey, full of decisions, events and thoughts.
Which in different ways has shaped us into who we are today. But to look back at your journey and to find those moments in life that triggered you can be hard.

Thats why Pi wants to draw the rest of your life on a line, so you can have a better understanding on how your mood is changing.

Look at it as a smart journal where you can:
-  Reflect on your mood
-  Go back and compare days
-  Find the patterns in why your mood went up or down

Your journal is safely synced onto your private iCloud, so you will never have to worry about any data being lost.

Emoji artwork provided by EmojiOne.com

description:
Struggling with sleep apnea or sleep insomnia? Join the community of 5 million+ users who have turned to Sleepiest, a solution recommended by doctors and sleep scientists to help you with unwinding anxiety, getting sleep better and achieving a tranquil slumber each night with bedtime stories.

Discover the calm within you with Sleepiest. Our app is your bedtime companion that aids you to fall asleep faster and improves the quality of your rest. This is achieved through an award-winning range of:

- 350 immersive bedtime stories for adults and kids
- 200 soothing sleep meditations
- 150 ambient sleep sounds (white noise,rain sounds, nature sounds, binaural beats, fan noise & more) 
- Sleep Podcasts (Koala Moon, Sleep Magic, Sleep Wave & Night Falls)
- Soundscapes
- Relax Melodies
- Ambient Sounds

Our selection of bedtime stories will transport you to magical forests, calm ocean vistas and beyond. Narratives crafted to cater to different tastes, from age-old classics to unique tales, every story aims to send you off to a restful sleep. Listen to one as you settle into bed, letting the relaxing narratives lull you into a peaceful slumber and help you fall asleep fast.

With Sleepiest, the journey to dreamland is accompanied by tranquil sleep sounds. Create your personalized soundscape using our \mixer\ tool. Layer the soft patter of rain sounds, the soothing rhythm of the ocean, or the calming hum of forest ambiance to curate your ultimate sleep-inducing melody using a mix of fan noise, ambient, nature sounds.

If tranquility is what you seek, look no further than our sleep meditations. Professionally guided and designed to calm your mind, these bedtime stories & sleep meditations are your ticket to serenity. Leave behind the day's stress, embrace better mental health, and wake up with a smile.

Rise and shine to the gentle nudge of our smart alarm sounds, designed to wake you up naturally and gently each morning.

Don't take our word for it! Here are some reviews from our well-rested users:

“I tried out both this app & BetterSleep with my two kids, but found the bedtime stories on Sleepiest helped them to sleep faster. Very happy mum.”

“10/10 recommend to fall asleep quickly and reduce anxiety before bed.”

“I often struggle to fall asleep fast, but it has been so easy to doze off with the sounds and the stories provided in the app. My mind calms quickly and relaxes my body.”

Whether you aim to overcome sleep, relieve stress, boost recovery, enhance mental health, or improve self-care, Sleepiest is here to guide you into a dream-filled slumber, offering soothing sleep sounds, fan noise to lull you into relaxation. Embrace the world of peaceful sleep today and overcome sleep apnea.

Additional Details:
Sleepiest offers an optional upgrade to Sleepiest+. New users receive a free trial period, which auto-renews into either a monthly or yearly subscription. The price for Sleepiest+ is $69.99 for yearly, or $9.99 for monthly.

description:
Feeling low or anxious? Worried about your mental health? You’re not alone. Life can be tough, but Tellmi makes it easy to talk about whatever is on your mind. Share your problems anonymously, and get the help and advice you need from our amazingly supportive community. Whether you are struggling with stress, anxiety or depression, having problems with family or friends, or dealing with difficult life experiences, the Tellmi community is here for you.

Tellmi is completely safe because every single post and reply is checked by a human moderator before it is published, and we have in-house counsellors if you need extra support. There are no AI bots. Just real people who really care about you. Tellmi is available 365 days a year and we will never let you down.


Tellmi is age banded, so you are always talking to people your age. You can filter your feed to connect to people who have had the same experiences as you, they get what you are going through. From self-harm to eating disorders, insomnia to autism, the Tellmi community can help you to understand, accept and address the things that are bothering you.

Developed by experts, Tellmi is the only peer support app that the NHS in the UK considers safe for children as young as 11. In 2021 an independent study by University College London found statistically significant evidence that using Tellmi helps people to feel better and less alone. The app increases confidence, reduces isolation and gives you the tools you need to manage your mental health.
In areas where Tellmi is commissioned by the NHS you may also be able to access free 1-2-1 text based therapy. Tellmi Therapy uses a solution-focused approach. It encourages you to think about what you can do, rather than what you can’t do. It enables you to  identify existing strengths and focus on aspects of yourself and your life that you can actually control.   The technique is designed to help you to imagine different outcomes so that you can move forward in life.

With Tellmi you can:

• Post problems anonymously and talk through anything you are struggling with.

• Manage your anxieties and build confidence. Independent evidence confirms that using Tellmi improves mental health.

• Age Banded: Get support from other people of a similar age. You’ll soon find out that you are not the only one struggling with a particular issue.

• Help others. Share your experience and help others who are in the same situation.

• 100% safe. Every post and reply is checked by human moderators before they go live, so there is no bullying, grooming or harassment.  

• Immediate support. Tellmi moderators and counsellors work 365 days a year from 8.30am to 11pm GMT.

• Risk support. In-app counsellors respond privately to high risk posts.

• Learn about wellbeing, mental health, sexual health, relationships, friendships and a whole lot more.

• Get published on an award-winning app. Send us your artwork, personal stories and poetry.

Please remember that Tellmi cannot provide medical or crisis support. Feel free to reach out to us directly if you have any questions: support@tellmi.help

When you can’t tell anyone else. Tellmi.

It enables you to better understand your sleep patterns and make changes for improvements. Doze is based from a research project led by sleep scientists and funded by the Canadian Institutes of Health Research. This research-derived and validated app was co-designed with young adults and tailored for individual sleep concerns.

How does it work:
- Complete a sleep diary for two weeks so you get to know your sleep habits
- We’ll give you feedback on how to improve your sleep, and you can make a plan for sleeping better
-Try out your sleep plan and see how your sleep has improved after two weeks! 

Doze app is completely free, try it today and take charge of managing your sleep health!

description:
Daybreak helps you change your relationship with alcohol. Whether your goal is to reduce your drinking, or complete abstinence, Daybreak is here to support you and your choice. 

Changing behaviour around alcohol use can be challenging, but you don't have to do it alone. Daybreak is a supportive and non-judgemental space where you can get the information and support you need to help achieve your goal. 

People who use Daybreak say they love waking up without hangovers, feel healthier & have more time to do the things they love. 
 
------------------------ 

What this Alcohol Support App Offers: 
 
- New! Drink Tracker: Set personal goals, visually monitor your consumption, and celebrate your wins with a supportive community that understands your challenges. 

- Peer community: a non-judgemental community of people just like you, where you can exchange information and support to help yourself and others with their alcohol behaviour change goals. 

- Personal Improvement: over 100 suggested activities for you to try, to help with your alcohol behaviour change goal. 

- Anonymous, safe, secure environment: get the support you need anonymously, in a safe and secure environment. 

- Technical and functionality support via our dedicated email address: support@daybreakprogram.org 

 ------------------------ 

Reasons to Download Daybreak: 

- Choose from being sober/alcohol-free, reducing your drinking, or maintaining the amount you’re currently drinking. There’s no pressure to stop drinking altogether. 
 
- Learn about the personal triggers that lead to your drinking – Such as work or social pressures, family, relationships, stress, or other mental health challenges and get support with managing them. 

- Be Inspired – We often hear members talk about the positive impact that changing their relationship with alcohol has had on their personal relationships, finances, and their emotional and physical wellbeing. 

- Professionally informed - App developed in conjunction with mental health professionals. 

- Daybreak is designed and developed by Hello Sunday Morning. We are a not-for-profit organisation with over 10 years’ experience using technology to help reduce stigma around alcohol & support people to make the changes they want to make. 

--------- 

Clinical Evaluation Results: 
 
An evaluation conducted by researchers at the National Drug Research Institute (NDRI) at Curtin University involving 793 Australian adults found that: 

- The 70 per cent of study participants classed as “probably dependent” more than halved their alcohol consumption while using Daybreak, from 40.8 standard drinks a week to 20.1 standard drinks. 

- Alcohol consumption among “risky/harmful” drinkers dropped from 22.9 standard drinks a week to 11.9 standard drinks, which is below the National Health and Medical Research Council guidelines that recommend no more than 14 drinks a week. 
 
--------- 

Subscription Pricing & Terms: 

Daybreak is free for all Australians and is funded by the Australian Government, Department of Health. 

International members can choose from two auto-renewing subscription options: 

- Daybreak Short Term Commitment $12.99 AUD per month 

- Daybreak Full Commitment $119.99 AUD per year 

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase. 

For more information about subscriptions and cancelations please see our terms and conditions https://www.hellosundaymorning.org/daybreak-terms-and-conditions/.

description:
Your privacy matters! eMoods never stores ANY of your data in the cloud or connects to any APIs.  No data ever leaves your phone without your explicit action.

Managing your mood just became easier and more effective!  eMoods is a private and easy to use mood tracker and diary for journaling, graphing, reporting, and managing symptoms related to Bipolar, Depression, Anxiety, and other mood disorders.  Start tracking, notice your triggers, and take control of your mood and other symptoms!

eMoods is a mood charting journal perfect for logging Bipolar I, Bipolar II, or any general kind of mood tracking!

eMoods allows you to track medication changes so that you can safely make adjustments, titrations or medication tapers with the help of your doctor and learn about what works and what doesn't.  These insights can be used for titrating up to a new medication or for assistance in coming off a medication.

eMoods allows you to send a monthly PDF report to your doctor

eMoods is a free mood tracker app that lets you easily chart your daily highs and lows/depressed and elevated moods, sleep, medications, and other symptoms related to common mood disorders like Bipolar/Manic Depressive illness. 

Email a printable PDF report at the end of each month to your doctor or caregiver to help you identify triggers or other events that could lead to an episode or relapse.  View in-app graphs and printable charts to track trends and visualize your symptoms and triggers in between appointments.

eMoods now includes a dark color theme and a colorblind-friendly color scheme.

Mood journaling is part of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and other treatments for bipolar, depression, and other mood and anxiety disorders.  Use this app with your doctor.

This app is for charting daily extremes of moods and other symptoms, and does not log multiple moods and other symptoms per day.

All features from version 1 of this app remain free.  Patronage is strictly optional.

description:
Your Mental Health Companion:

With hundreds of mindfulness meditation apps to pick from, what makes Meditopia so special? Well, unlike most of the other options, Meditopia offers more than just a short-term solution to falling asleep, finding balance and de-stressing; we offer each member over 1000 deep-dive meditations and breathing exercises that get right to the heart of what we as a people, regardless of age, background, or experience, are dealing with everyday.

These meditations, offered in 12 languages, aim to cover the entire spectrum of human experiences from relationships, expectations, acceptance, and loneliness, to our body-image, sexuality, life purpose, and feelings of inadequacy. Meditopia doesn’t just want to be a band-aid for wounds which we know require permanent healing. Our goal is to create a mental health sanctuary in which you can access the guidance and tools you need to build up mental resilience, calm, balance, a healthy headspace and peace of mind. Everything you need to feel happier, relax, and sleep like a baby.

Download now and try a free meditation!

What can you get with Meditopia?

Sleep Meditations + Breathing exercises
Your quality of sleep affects almost every aspect of your daily life. So why not help yourself get better sleep? Try any one of our +30 sleep meditations to learn new techniques as well as breathing and visualization exercises that you can continue to practice throughout the rest of your life to promote good sleep. Say bye to that old sound machine and that one-function breathing app.

Bedtime Stories
Bedtime fairy stories aren’t just for kids! As you tuck yourself into bed, all warm and cozy, let us lull you to sleep with our wide selection of bedtime stories. From fairy tales and adventures to experiences in places all throughout the world, feel yourself getting pulled into these vivid and soothing stories. After all, at the end of a long day, you deserve to gently ease into a dreamworld of sleep and recovery. We also have a wide library of sleep sounds like rain, waves, and relaxing noises like white noise and more..

Our Top Features:
+1000 guided meditations
Nature sounds with a timer
Daily Meditations on a new topic every day
Daily Inspirational Quotes
Personal Note-taking to track your progress
Mindful Meter to see your mindfulness stats at a glance
In-app challenges with friends to feel challenged
Custom reminders to sleep and meditate
User-friendly and user-oriented interface


Meditopia’s meditation library offers over 1000+ guided meditations on topics including:
Stress
Acceptance
Compassion
Gratitude
Happiness
Anger
Self-Confidence
Motivation
Focus
Sexuality
Breath
Body Positivity
Change & Courage
Inadequacy
Self-Love
Less Guided Meditations
Body Scan
White Noise

Wisdo is an award-winning safe and welcoming support community, where you can connect with and meet people going through similar life challenges as you. description:
Breathr 3.0 shows you easy and fun ways to practice mindfulness. It was developed by experts at BC Children’s Hospital Kelty Mental Health Resource Centre and Centre for Mindfulness, and has been updated to include new content, functionality and features. Breathr was originally created for young people, but has been expanded for everyone to give it a try!

Begin to explore and experience practices of mindfulness and self-compassion, choosing from a variety of practices. Breathr can help you to live in the present moment, while providing interesting facts about the many benefits of mindfulness.

BENEFITS OF MINDFULNESS

Mindfulness is beneficial for your mind, body and relationships.

It can help:

Reduce stress, anxiety and depression
Improve memory and concentration
Lead to better sleep
Improve decision-making skills
Strengthen your connection to and relationships with others


BREATHR 3.0 FEATURES

Whether you have a minute a day or 15, Breathr offers many ways to get your mindfulness practice started.

What you'll find:

2 to 10-minute guided meditations, led by mindfulness experts at BC Children's Hospital
Mindfulness practices that you can do anywhere
A Journal function to add notes on the feelings and thoughts that come up for you
A Create feature lets you choose the duration and soundscape for a custom practice
The ability to filter activities by outcome, topic, or stressor to easily find what you’re looking for
Activities that are more accessible, with captions you can easily turn on or off
Five new meditations/practices, including PEACE, Mindful Movement, and Loving Kindness for your Child

description:
Daily Heart Rate measurements is your way to a healthy and happy life. 

Our app helps you measure your heart rate instantly with your iPhone. You can measure your heart rate anytime, anywhere, concerned about heart health. No other devices needed! Simply place your finger on the camera, gently press and measure the pulse in a few seconds. The Heart Rate PRO detects a color change in your finger tip each time your heart beats and uses an advanced algorithm to show you your heart rate. 
App provides the best cardio exercise and meditations you can do at home. In addition, with the Heart Rate PRO app, you will never forget to drink sufficient water per day.

• Receive reminders to check your pulse and track your heart rate on a daily basis. 
• Track your daily, weekly, monthly and yearly graphs and statistics. 
• Generate monthly health reports and easily consult with professionals. 
• Safe your data in Cloud. In case you lose or change your phone, you can easily load all your saved data in your new device. 
• Widgets: access the main features of our app from your iPhone's home screen! 

The Main Advantages:
- Measure your heart rate anytime, anywhere
- Accurate pulse in a few seconds with camera 
- Add tags and comments to your measurements
- The easiest way to track daily water consume  
- Do best exercises to strengthen your heart
- Perform a variety of calming meditations 
- Easily control or lose weight 
- Automatic calculation of BMI
- Track real time pulse statistics 
- View full heart rate, workout, meditations history
- Generate monthly health reports 
- Read everyday healthy articles 
- Connect to the Apple Watch 
- Heart Rate PRO integrates with the Apple Health app on Apple Watch. Your pulse measurements will be sent to the Health app from Apple Watch. 

TIPS FOR BEST RESULTS
• Be sure your fingertip completely covers the camera lens and the flashlight. 
• Always hold your phone steady, keep still and don’t talk during a measurement.
• Make sure your fingers are not wet or too cold.
• Don't press too hard to avoid restricting blood flow to your finger.
• Supports iPhone 5s and later, iPads that support the Flash function and Apple Watch. On devices without flash the app has to be used in good lighting.

DISCLAIMER!

This app is not intended to diagnose, prevent or treat any condition, or to be a substitute for professional medical care. 

IMPORTANT NOTE 

The Heart Rate PRO app cannot measure your blood pressure. To measure your blood pressure, you must use an instrument call a sphygmomanometer, also known as a blood pressure monitor, or blood pressure gauge. 
The app is NOT designed for medical use. It is meant only for fitness use and as a source of general health information.

You can upgrade your version to premium membership:
- You can subscribe for one week period. 
- There are three days free trial for weekly subscription. 
- Unused portion of free trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscriptions get renewed automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase.
- Cancellation of the current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.
- Get details about how you can manage your subscriptions: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039   

By using the app, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://appinno.net/heartrate/privacy.html
https://appinno.net/heartrate/terms.html

Check out the FAQ page at: https://appinno.net/heartrate/faq.html
Or contact us: askmeanything24hr@gmail.com

description:
OurHerd empowers young people to open up about tough times, to learn from each other’s experiences and to create a more mentally healthy world.

Mental health is one of the biggest issues we’re facing today, but so often we feel alone in our struggles, are unable to speak up and don’t know how to get help. 

By sharing stories, we can empower each other with hope and knowledge, whilst using our voice (and shared experience) to create positive change. 

OurHerd is a safe digital platform that guides you to share your story confidently, whilst securely capturing data and insights from your experience to give young people a voice to inform governments, policy makers and service providers on better mental health outcomes.

We're changing the world, one story at a time!

Join OurHerd to:
• Use your voice to create positive change for mental health
• Learn to share your story safely and to help others going through a tough time
• Be inspired, empowered and supported by a positive community
• Feel connected to people you can relate to and learn from their experiences

OurHerd was proudly designed in collaboration with over 600 young people and 75 mental health experts. Plus we’ve been recognised with two Good Design Awards for Social Impact and Digital Design!

We continue to engage with the community and research at every stage as we improve the app. We want to make OurHerd the most useful app for you! Please email us at hello@ourherd.io to let us know your thoughts and ideas.

description:
Relax Melodies is now BetterSleep. New name, same great app.

→  Editors’ choice on Google Play

Sleep better. Feel better.
BetterSleep helps you understand and improve your sleep with sleep tracking, premium sleep sounds and guided content curated just for you.  

Recommended by leading doctors, neuropsychologists, and sleep experts, BetterSleep is also validated by millions of users around the world. 91% of our listeners say they slept better after using the app for just one week.

Here’s how:

Premium audio content
Fall asleep easily, sleep soundly, and develop lasting sleep habits, with dreamy soundscapes, narrated stories, and meditations that really work, all perfectly tuned to your needs.

Sleep tracker
Track your sleep, understand how it works and let us propose actionable ways to improve it. 

Sleep science
Learn about the science behind your unique sleep needs and discover your personal chronotype.

Many sleep apps offer tracking and nothing more.

BetterSleep offers an unprecedented suite of features to help you create nightly habits to fall asleep and stay asleep:

🌖 Sleep sounds, brainwaves, and white noise:
Explore our selection of more than 300 soothing sounds, music, beats, and tones designed specially by our in-house experts to guide you to sleep. Mix them together to create your very own soundscapes.

Our library includes:
– Nature sounds: wind, rustling leaves, birds, crackling fire
– White noise: hair dryer, airplane, dryer, vacuum, fan noise
– Water sounds: rainstorm, ocean, slow waves, lapping water
– Meditation music: voices, instruments, ambient melodies
– Isochronic brainwaves: 2.5Hz, 4Hz, 5Hz, 8Hz, 10Hz, 20Hz
– Binaural beats: 2.5Hz, 4Hz, 5Hz, 8Hz, 10Hz, 20Hz
– Solfeggio Frequencies: 174Hz, 285Hz, 396Hz, 417Hz, 432Hz, 528Hz

🌖 Bedtime stories and SleepTales

Choose from more than 100 bedtime stories voiced by award-winning narrators and written specially to help you fall softly and naturally asleep. 

Themes include:
- Fairytale
- Mystery
- Sci-fi
- Fantasy
- History
- Kids
- Journey
- Myths and legends
- Non-fiction

🌖 Sleep Moves

Experience our innovative Sleep Moves exercises, a series of gentle bedtime relaxation techniques developed in collaboration with sleep experts to prepare your mind and body for stress-free sleep. Themes include:
– Mini: To help you unwind quickly
– Together: Unwind with this relaxation routine for couples
– Travel: Overcome jet-lag and homesickness
– Cooldown: Shed any excess energy from a stressful day
– Harmony: Find balance and recenter yourself

🌖 Breathing techniques: sound breathing for day and night

Clear your mind and achieve your personal goals for anxiety reduction with our breathing exercises combined with soothing sounds. Melt your worries away with topics like:
– Take a break
– De-stress
– Clear your mind
– Fall asleep
– Heart coherence

Also featuring: 

Bedtime reminder: Consistent sleep times lead to more restful sleep
Timer: Stop the application after a set amount of time
Favorites: Easy access to your favorite mixes
Playlist: Choose your favorite content to create the perfect sleep time playlist  
Smart Mix: Seamless, natural sound mixes with no distracting audio loops
...and much more.

BetterSleep offers in-app purchases including auto-renewable subscriptions to access premium features

Brought to you by Ipnos,
Need help with the app? Message our support team via the Help & Support section in the app or by visiting https://support.bettersleep.com

description:
We’re New & Growing – Over 3,000 Users and Counting, Finding Balance, Calm, and Confidence with Bloomly.

Bloomly is your personal audio coach, delivering soothing, personalized guidance that helps you feel better, reduce anxiety, and handle life's ups and downs with ease. Backed by science and designed by psychologists, Bloomly gently rewires your mind so you can truly thrive.

96% Feel Positive Changes Within One Week

Simply press play and let Bloomly effortlessly adapt to your mood, goals, and progress. Experience meaningful growth without stress or pressure—just listen for 10 minutes a day.

WHY CHOOSE BLOOMLY?
- Effortless Growth: No effort required—just listen and let the positive changes happen naturally.
- Tailored to You: Your unique well-being profile ensures guidance that feels relevant and effective.
- Listen Anywhere: Integrate Bloomly seamlessly into your life—at work, at home, or on the move.
- Scientifically Proven: Based on positive psychology and cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), trusted by experts, validated by research, and loved by thousands.

WHY WE CREATED BLOOMLY
We believe everyone deserves effective mental wellness support. Most mental health apps fall short. We created Bloomly to truly make a difference, bringing genuine joy and effectiveness back into mental health care.

FREE OR PREMIUM
- Free Forever: Enjoy personalized 10-minute daily sessions.
- Premium: Unlock unlimited sessions, exclusive content, and advanced tracking features.

Start feeling better today—just press play and let Bloomly help you grow.

description:
AFib 2gether™  is a shared decision-making mobile platform that may be helpful to both patients and clinicians. AFib 2gether™  helps you build your understanding of stroke risk due to diagnosis of atrial fibrillation, which is a type of irregular heartbeat, not caused by heart valve problem. The goal of the app is to help you have an informed discussion with your health care provider.

For atrial fibrillation patients and caregivers:
You will answer questions which will help you and your clinicians determine your risk of stroke due to atrial fibrillation by providing a personalized risk score calculation. You will also be able to prioritize questions of importance about your atrial fibrillation and stroke risk for discussion with your healthcare provider.

Utilizing the Resources section within the app will help you learn about atrial fibrillation and the risks associated with this condition.  You will also have the opportunity to understand the terminology of your condition; view videos that help you understand the condition, and access links to other helpful sites.

For atrial fibrillation providers:
AFib 2gether™   helps support a shared decision making conversation for patients who are diagnosed with atrial
fibrillation not caused by a heart valve problem.  In 2016, the ACC/AHA/HRS published quality metrics which highlight shared decision making in atrial fibrillation.  The app will assist the patient-provider interaction and help facilitate a discussion about stroke risk due to atrial fibrillation.

Intended for U.S. audiences only.
The health information contained herein is provided for educational purposes only and not intended to replace discussions with a healthcare provider.  All decisions regarding patient care must be made with a healthcare provider, considering the unique characteristics of the patient.

Provided by Pfizer

description:
Monitor your mental health and use your mental status as a diary to gain insights into how you are feeling.
Use Parazute on your own, or together with a network that you invite to the app.
Parazute uses scientifically validated methods, and the data can be used together with your healthcare professional.

GET PEACE OF MIND WITH A NETWORK OF PARAZUTERS

When struggling with mental illness, it’s only natural that you can find it challenging to reach out for help when you are mentally free-falling. To help you, Parazute deploys support from your network when your mental status negatively changes. Early support - even with minor changes in mental status can prevent hospitalization, self-damage, or even more unnecessary fatal tragedies.

Parazute can be used for all mental disorders where support from the social network is sometimes needed to move forward, such as ADHD, anxiety, bipolar disorder, borderline, dementia, depression, addiction disorders, OCD, PTSD, psychoses, self-harm, schizophrenia, eating disorders, stress, etc.

WITH PARAZUTE, RELATIVES MAY STAY CALM

As relatives, there’s a lot of stress and anxiety at stake every day, and you’re desperately trying to help your loved ones. With Parazute, you’ll be notified should a mentally ill friend or a family member need your support. 

HOW PARAZUTE WORKS

The Parazute app reports the mental health status to the network based on a few daily inputs. It is less than one minute of effort for the patient. In case of adverse development in mental status – the self-selected “Parazuters” made up of family, friends, and even caregivers that the patient already trust today, get notified that the patient need some love.

Parazute cannot diagnose mental illnesses nor assess the relative level of a given mental state, for example, severe, moderate, or mild depression.

Parazute is also not a treatment but only early detection of a change in mental state and then activation of support from the network.

In case of indication of self-harm, always seek help actively.

Parazute is developed by patients, relatives, and mental healthcare professionals in close collaboration with the Danish National Association for Mental Health.

 
OUR SOCIAL COMMITMENT IS MORE THAN JUST WORDS

Parazute has been built from the ground up in a true co-creation spirit. Every employee at Parazute has hands-on experience within the mental illness field, whether it’s being a patient, a relative, or a healthcare professional – simply put, it’s a job requirement.

We’re committed to donating 30% of our monthly basis fees directly towards scientific research to actively help the study of digital psychiatry and the emotional well-being of relatives.

We'd love to hear about your Parazute experience: Reach out to us if you have any feedback or questions: E-mail - info@parazute.com
 
PARAZUTE SUBSCRIPTION

Unlock full access to your mental health insights with Parazute.
 
• Access all of your historical data, and see your development over time.
• Download your mental status over time to bring to your healthcare professional.

Parazute offers auto-renewing subscription:
 
• $14.99 billed annually
 
For more information, see our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: 
https://parazute.com/terms/
https://parazute.com/privacy-policy/
 
These prices are in US Dollars (USD). Pricing in other currencies and countries may vary, and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Parazute is for people living with anxiety, depression, stress, ADHD, PTSD, bipolar disease, and many more

appName: Prevent A Suicide: What To Say
description:
Do you know someone who wishes they were dead, or who may be thinking about ending their life? Do you want to help them but you don’t know what to say? Are you afraid of saying the wrong thing? Prevent A Suicide: What To Say is the app for you. It helps you send messages that can make a difference and save a life. It is much easier to communicate by text when dealing with a difficult topic such as suicide.

Just tapping on a message in the app transfers that text to iMessage or WhatsApp (if installed), ready to send or modify before sending. Drawing on lived experience from people who have been there, and medically approved, Prevent A Suicide: What To Say is an app designed to help you communicate with someone who may be at risk of suicide. It is based on the website https://preventasuicide.org which provides evidence-based guidance and support from survivors, supporters and experts in suicide prevention.

This app helps you find the words to send messages around the following themes:
•	What you can ask
•	What you can say
•	What you can do
•	Get help when it’s critical
•	Support for you

All our messages are medically approved and peer supported texts that you can send, and edit if you wish, to suit your situation.

Prevent A Suicide is user-friendly, simple and intuitive to use. The app is privacy focused and does not collect or store any personal information and there is no sign-up process. Just download the app for free and you’re ready to use it.

Prevent A Suicide is more than just an app. It is a way to show someone that you care, that you understand, and that you are there for them. It is a way to prevent a suicide by sending a message, saving a life. The app is proudly created by the Australian Suicide Prevention Foundation, which is a government registered charity. We aim to reduce thoughts of suicide, attempted suicide and deaths from suicide in Australia and around the world.

Download and join us in our mission to save lives.

description:
What is Slumber?
Improve your sleep habits with an audio library of 1000+ sleep stories, guided sleep meditations & soothing night sounds. Slumber is the best sleeping app for relaxation and beating insomnia.

Fall Asleep in 5 minutes with:

☾ Soothing Sleep Sounds
☾ Guided Sleep Meditations
☾ Audio Bedtime Stories
☾ Calming Music for Anxiety & ADHD Relief
☾ Anti-Insomnia Nature Soundscapes
☾ Fairy Tales - Short Stories for Babies and Teens
☾ White Noise, Brown Noise, Green Noise & more
☾ New Relaxing Sounds & Audio Stories are Added Weekly!

Improve Sleep with Slumber

😴Feeling stressed and tired?
Our sleep app features calming sleep music, guided meditations, and sleeping stories to aid in sleep and improve overall rest quality with bedtime stories.

😴Struggling with insomnia??
Our help sleeping app has over 1000+ sleep stories & soothing sounds for everyone that will help you to sleep well throughout the night.

How does Slumber help falling asleep?

Listening to a calming sleep story or a soothing sound allows you to focus your mind on the story’s narrative. According to the American Academy of Sleep Medicine, improving rest quality helps the body better regulate everything from digestion to cognitive performance.

Our users reported having a better mood and lower stress levels, anxiety & adhd relief that allowed them to sleep better throughout the night.

The popular sleep app on iOS is now available on Android!

“...sleep music, guided meditations, breathing exercises and audio stories deploying soothing soundscapes…” - The Washington Post

😴Our Sleep App Features:

★ Large audio library of sleep meditations, sleep stories, bedtime stories for adults and kids
★ Guided sleep meditations and relaxing  sleep sounds utilize mindfulness, gratitude, and suggestive hypnosis to help you  fall asleep and relax
★ Mix feature - customizable night music and soothing sleep sounds allow you to create the perfect sleep ambiance for anxiety, ADHD & stress relief
★ Handpicked collections of audio sleep stories and relaxing sounds by topic - like sleep sounds, lullabies for babies, or classic fairy tales
★ Original bedtime stories for adults & kids crafted by Slumber Studios team

Check out what our users have to say:
★★★★★  Slumber is Better for sleep than the Calm app
I bought Slumber & Calm at the same time. When I want help sleeping, I find myself turning to Slumber only. Their narrators are more skilled in the relaxing & soothing style of speaking. You don't need celebrities; you need people with calming, wonderful voices who know how to read in a hypnotherapy-style cadence. And Slumber has better sleep sound options, and you have more control over those options. I also like that you can choose to keep playing the background noise, and perhaps a sound like rain, for a set amount of time after the narration ends. Also— better calm stories designed for relaxing, comforting sleep too! Plus, the price is better.

-- Cafegirl2009, App Store Review

Curing insomnia is not only about sounds to help you sleep. Sleeping meditation, audio bedtime stories, calming stories for sleep & other sleep aids can also help. Our goal is to help you get a good sleep at night. Our bedtime app does not provide sleep games that make you sleepy.

Or are you looking for a quit weed tracker that will also help you take a tolerance break?

You need Grounded: Quit Weed - the #1 quit weed app. Dedicated to helping you quit weed or to take a tolerance break, the stop smoking app can help you stay smoke-free or quit your habit completely. 

Whether you’re here to quit cold turkey or to take a tolerance break (T-break), we have all the quit cannabis tools you need in your weed smoking cessation journey.

📛STOP USING & TRANSFORM YOUR LIFE✅

Although weed / marijuana is nowhere near as destructive or as addictive as a cigarette (not even close!), and the plant itself has been noted to contain many health benefits and many other uses such as hemp, and CBD, there is a growing number of findings that a percentage of its users can become addicted to it. 

THC in marijuana may not be physically addictive, but users can become dependent on it for a number of reasons. Dependence can range from, avoiding life problems, and boredom to dealing with anxiety, and depression. If marijuana has caused a negative impact on your life, Grounded can help you quit smoking, vaping and transform your life. With our stop smoking trackers quitting smoking is easy, focused and mindful which gives better results to stop this health harming bad habit.

✖️OR TAKE A SHORT BREAK

We also recognize that some users who would like to use Grounded are not life long ganja quitters but may just want to take a short break to increase their tolerance, or to flush the THC out of their system. So besides stop smoking trackers, we have provided tools to help them track breaks also. Grounded provides all the quit tracker tools and resources needed for all our 420 friends on all sides of the 420 spectra. With our weed tracker and quit smoking app you are in complete control of how you consume your weed.

👍HOW IT CAN HELP YOU

- Our quit cannabis journal gives you a health stats section that includes a list of withdrawal symptoms and how long until the symptoms will be gone

- The health stats sections of our weed journal also track how long until your tolerance is reset. Your cannabinoid receptors need to be reset for THC to be fully effective

- Use our weed tracker to log your daily feelings in your give up smoking journey. This helps you learn more about your cravings and weed abstinence

- Count how long you’ve stayed away from cannabis. Our precise quit cannabis tracker will calculate even the seconds when you avoid smoking cannabis.

- Unlike most weed journal and bad habbit quitting apps, here you can also watch your money grow because of how much you’ve saved from quitting cannabis.

- Stay motivated and get rewarded with achievements for the amount of time you’ve been able to quit cannabis. This is another important tool if you want to quit for life.

Now the time has come to stay weed smoke-free and reinvent your everydays with an easy quit stop smoking weed app.

Try the best quitting cannabis / tolerance break weed apps and you won’t be disappointed! Whether you want to stop smoking or quit vaping for life, or you need quit weed journal to do a t-break, you will hardly find an easier and more complete quit weed tracker tools than on Grounded.

👉Download the #1 quit weed journal & bad habit tracker app for free!

description:
Stay Alive is a pocket suicide prevention resource for the UK, packed full of useful information and tools to help people stay safe in crisis. You can use it if you are having thoughts of suicide or if you are concerned about someone else who may be considering suicide.

Some of the app’s evidence-based features include:

• Find Help Now - Quick access to a large database of UK national and local crisis support, and online support services.
• LifeBox - A place to store life-affirming photos, videos, and audio.
• Safety Plan - A customisable plan that can be filled out by a person considering suicide.
• Wellness Plan - A place to store positive thoughts, inspiration, ideas.
• Reasons For Living - A place to keep statements reminding you why you should stay alive.
• Worried about Someone - Guidance and advice for those supporting others in crisis.
• Myths about Suicide – A place where common myths about suicide are debunked.

Stay Alive is confidential, free to access and does not contain any advertisements. Stay Alive is currently available in 14 languages: Bulgarian, Danish, English, Finnish, French, Italian, German, Norwegian, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Polish, and Welsh.

Stay Alive is an award-winning app designed and developed by charity Grassroots Suicide Prevention, with clinical expertise provided by Sussex Partnership NHS Foundation Trust.  During development, extensive consultation took place on the content of the app through local focus groups of people with lived experience, a team of mental health professionals, along with an online survey with 300+ participants. Since launch the app has gone through numerous iterations, with ongoing developments in terms of functionality and user-interface, in response to user testing and feedback.

We aim to respond to all reviews within two weeks. If you have any questions or experience any issues with the app, please email us at app@prevent-suicide.org.uk and we will endeavour to work quickly to resolve any problems as soon as possible.

All guidance and information within the app are reviewed and updated every 6 months to check all resources are updated and links are in working order. The app is fully compliant with GDPR and international data management standards.

Testimonials: 

• “Just downloaded and looked through your Stay Alive app which is excellent (I’m a GP putting together information resources to give out to patients who may be at risk of suicide). It’s really, really good and I’m so impressed, particularly by ability to add photos from camera roll.” - Dr Helen Ashdown.

• “This is the next best thing to a friend sitting with me, holding my hand when I am down and out.”- Dr Sangeeta Mahajan.

• “The Stay Alive app is a life saver. This is not just a turn of phrase, but it actually saves lives of those who have thoughts of suicide” – Ian Stringer.

description:
Don't let chronic pain stop you from living your life and doing the things you love. Manage My Pain has helped over 100,000 re-take control over their conditions like back pain, neck pain, fibromyalgia, headaches, and arthritis.

Created in partnership with global experts in pain management, Manage My Pain has been clinically-validated to improve outcomes in peer-reviewed research studies.

Manage My Pain will help you:
• Track your pain & activity: Reflect on your day in less than 60 seconds to see patterns and trends
• Analyze your pain: Graphs and charts make it easy to figure out what makes your pain better or worse
• Share your pain: Our reports, created by doctors for doctors, will help you tell your story
• Learn from pain experts: Explore content about how pain works and strategies to manage it (for subscribers only)

Your data is safe with us! We take privacy and security seriously and never sell or disclose your Personal Health Information without explicit consent.

Our app is free to use with absolutely no ads. Insights in the app and in the reports that are generated by our app are limited to 30 days and can be unlocked with an in-app purchase or through credits. A monthly subscription is also available to gain access to our Pain Guide - a set of educational content developed by pain experts that can teach you about pain and coping strategies to manage it.

Use this pain management app to replace your hand-written: 
• pain diary 
• pain journal 
• pain log 
• pain tracker

description:
Suicide Safe is a suicide prevention learning tool for primary care and behavioral health providers and is based on the nationally recognized Suicide Assessment Five-step Evaluation and Triage (SAFE-T) practice guidelines. Suicide Safe helps providers feel confident to assist patients who present with suicidal ideation. The app offers tips on how to communicate effectively with patients and their families, determine appropriate next steps, and make referrals to treatment and community resources.

Features: 
	•	Learn the five steps of the SAFE-T approach in working with patients and easily download resources for use offline.
	•	Study interactive sample case studies to see the SAFE-T approach in action.
	•	Browse conversation starters that provide sample language and tips for talking with patients about their suicidal ideation.
	•	Explore clinical and educational resources and share crisis line phone numbers and other patient-focused materials.
	•	Use SAMHSA’s Behavioral Health Treatment Services Locator to provide timely referrals for patients. The Locator can be filtered by type and distance.
Email SAMHSA at SAMHSAInfo@samhsa.hhs.gov with any questions or comments.

Note: This app is a free resource provided by the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration, U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, and was funded by Federal resources.
